source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000010_TATARU<tab>Look how many people there are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000010_TATARU<tab>Ils sont si nombreux à avoir répondu à notre appel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000020_TATARU<tab>Should we get to it, then? Pick up anything that seems the least bit “device” like, and we'll make ourselves a pile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000020_TATARU<tab>Allez, nous aussi nous allons aider aux recherches. Ramassez tout ce qui vous semble suspect<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000030_BIGGS<tab>Well if it isn't the hero of the hour! Maybe you'll change our luck─we've found bugger all without you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000030_BIGGS<tab>(-Voix familière-)Ah, voilà la cavalerie<var 1D /var>! Vous tombez à pic, on manquait de bras ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000040_TATARU<tab>Biggs! Wedge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000040_TATARU<tab>Biggs, Wedge<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000050_BIGGS<tab>Aye, aye, well we could hardly say no to a call for aid from the Scions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000050_BIGGS<tab>C'est toujours un plaisir de rendre service aux Héritiers de la Septième Aube.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000060_BIGGS<tab>Jessie collared the chief for some other business, so we'll be working twice as hard to make up for his not being here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000060_BIGGS<tab>Cid a été retenu par Jessie, mais on va travailler d'arrache-pied pour compenser son absence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000070_WEDGE<tab>Thrice as hard, even!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000070_WEDGE<tab>V-vous pouvez compter sur nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000080_TATARU<tab>Thank you─both of you! I'm sure we'll find that beacon in no time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000080_TATARU<tab>Votre motivation fait plaisir à voir. Tous ensemble, nous allons trouver ce fameux dispositif<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000090_BIGGS<tab>Hm. I'm not seeing anything out here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000090_BIGGS<tab>On dirait qu'il y a rien, par ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000100_BIGGS<tab>D'you reckon you could squeeze in there, Wedge?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000100_BIGGS<tab>Wedge, tu crois que tu peux te faufiler à l'intérieur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000110_WEDGE<tab>And get stuck halfway!? No thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000110_WEDGE<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? C'est vrai que je suis petit, mais il y a quand même des limites<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000120_TATARU<tab>I could try if you like!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000120_TATARU<tab>Dans ce cas, c'est moi qui vais y aller<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000130_WEDGE<tab>Tataru, no! We couldn't ask you to do that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000130_WEDGE<tab>N-non, pas toi, Tataru<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000140_TATARU<tab>Oh, I'll be fine! This receptionist is not afraid to get her hands dirty!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000140_TATARU<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, voyons. Je suis plutôt souple, pour une réceptionniste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000150_BIGGS<tab>Sorry, I-I meant to say─the scholars haven't finished their preliminary assessment of the site yet, so we're not supposed to venture too far in.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000150_BIGGS<tab>J'aurais dû te prévenir<var 1D /var>! Cette zone n'est pas encore sécurisée, et les membres de la Fondation nous ont demandé de rester à l'écart.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000160_BIGGS<tab>...Hm, what's that you got there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000160_BIGGS<tab>Tu as trouvé quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000170_BIGGS<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> looks promising!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000170_BIGGS<tab>Ooooh<var 1D /var>! De toutes nos découvertes, c'est ce qui ressemble le plus à un... dispositif<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000180_WEDGE<tab>Uhh...isn't that the Ironworks' symbol? ...Counterfeiters?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000180_WEDGE<tab>Regardez, c'est pas le logo des Forges de Garlond<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now...<var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var> I have you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Cette fois, tu viens avec moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000200_BIGGS<tab>You all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000200_BIGGS<tab>Hé, ça va<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000210_WEDGE<tab>What's happening!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000210_WEDGE<tab>Que se passe-t-il<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000220_TATARU<tab>(PANICKED WHIMPERING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000220_TATARU<tab>Oh non, ça recommence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Stay with me! Focus on my voice!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ça va marcher... Ça <var 1A 02 /var>doit<var 1A 01 /var> marcher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let expanse contract, eon become instant...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Que l'éternité devienne instant... Que soient transcendés l'espace et le temps...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000250_TATARU<tab>...Wait, this must be it! The device! This is <var 1A 02 /var>supposed<var 1A 01 /var> to happen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000250_TATARU<tab>Ça voudrait dire que c'est le bon appareil<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Throw wide the gates that we may pass!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Que s'ouvrent les portes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000270_TATARU<tab>Safe journey, Warrior of Light. Find our friends, and bring them home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000270_TATARU<tab>Soyez <var 08 E905 ((prudente)) ((prudent)) /var><var 1D /var>! Et si vous voyez les autres, ramenez-les-nous sains et saufs<var 1D /var>! Au revoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000275_MEMORY<tab>聞いて
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000275_MEMORY<tab>聞いて

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000280_MINFILIA<tab>Your time has not yet come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000280_MINFILIA<tab>Tu as encore un rôle à jouer, tu ne peux pas disparaître.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>From endless dreams, I awake.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je me réveillai enfin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Something vague...yet urgent...calls me to action once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Mon esprit était encore embrouillé, comme au sortir d'un rêve interminable, mais j'avais la nette impression qu'on m'avait appelé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000310_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Rare to meet someone out here who's not a peddler themself. What brings you into the wilds this time o' night?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000310_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Je ne crois pas vous connaître. Que faites-vous ici, au beau milieu de la nuit<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What do you mean, “this time of night”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Au beau milieu de la nuit<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>But it's bright as day...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Nous sommes en plein jour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000320_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>(CHUCKLE)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000320_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>(ricane)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000330_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Well, if it ain't the oldest joke in the book. Me grandad─gods rest his soul─used to tell that one to the barman at kickin'-out time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000330_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Voilà belle lurette que je ne l'avais pas entendue, celle-là<var 1D /var>! Mon grand-père la racontait pour égayer les soirées, entre deux chopines.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000340_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>"An' when, pray tell, did we last have a dark night? Ye rotten old drunk ye!“ he'd reply.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000340_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>“Camarades, vous avez bien le temps de boire tout votre soûl, la nuit ne va pas tomber de sitôt<var 1D /var>! Ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>!”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000345_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000345_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>よっと

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000350_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>"Over a hundred bleedin' years ago, that's when!“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000350_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Vous vous rendez compte<var 1D /var>? Ça fait déjà un siècle que l'obscurité a disparu de ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000360_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Hm! You've got that look down to a tee. I'd almost think you meant it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000360_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>? Vous avez l'air de tomber des nues.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000370_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Ahhh, got to you, did they? Poor beggar. That explains it, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000370_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Ne me dites pas qu'une de ces horreurs vous a <var 08 E905 ((attaquée)) ((attaqué)) /var>... <var 08 E905 ((Ma pauvre)) ((Mon pauvre)) /var>, vous devez encore être sous le choc.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000375_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>ごくり
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000375_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>ごくり

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000380_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Well, I've roads to travel and wares to sell, but you─you'd best hurry along to the town nearby.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000380_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Il me reste de la route à faire, alors je vais devoir vous laisser. Je vous conseille d'aller vous reposer dans la ville pas très loin d'ici, ça vous fera du bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000390_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Just head east through the trees, and aim for the shining tower. You'll find the place soon enough. 'Tis the biggest settlement for malms around.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000390_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Vers l'est, vous devriez apercevoir une immense structure cristallisée au sortir de la forêt. C'est à sa base que s'étend la plus grande cité des environs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000400_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Go on, now, friend. They'll take good care of you in the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000400_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Le refuge des insoumis à la Lumière... Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>To dizzying heights it rises, the gleaming spire, its tip threatening to pierce the blinding canopy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>La tour était monumentale, et s'élevait si haut dans les cieux qu'elle semblait percer leur clarté infinie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>There it will all begin anew. Between Dark and Light, the pure and the corrupt─the one true struggle...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>C'est là que devait reprendre le sempiternel combat des Ténèbres contre la Lumière, du Mal contre le Bien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000430_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Halt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000430_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Halte-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000440_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Every face in this city I know. Yours I do not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000440_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Quel étrange accoutrement... Tu n'es pas d'ici, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000450_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)This is the threshold of the Crystarium, stranger, and I am its gatekeeper. If you would enter, you will answer my questions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000450_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Je ne sais pas ce qui t'amène, mais on n'a pas pour habitude de laisser entrer n'importe qui, ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000460_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)From where do you hail?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000460_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Commence donc par me dire d'où tu viens, <var 08 E905 ((étrangère)) ((étranger)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Where are you from?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gridania.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>De Gridania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>De Limsa Lominsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>D'Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000470_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Do you take me for a fool? No such place exists.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000470_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)... Jamais entendu parler. Pourtant, Norvrandt n'est plus bien grand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000480_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)"The Source“? What is this cryptic nonsense?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000480_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Le “monde primitif”<var 1D /var>!? Tu ne serais pas en train de te payer ma tête<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000490_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)You will not say? Then I have even less reason to trust you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000490_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Tu ne fais qu'aggraver ton cas en gardant le silence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000500_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Had you given me an honest answer, I would not have barred your way─we care little here for a person's place of origin. But instead you chose concealment, and I will not suffer you to pass...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000500_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Le statut ou les origines importent peu à Cristarium. En revanche, crapules et consorts ne sont pas les bienvenus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000501_LYNA<tab>Hah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000501_LYNA<tab>Yah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000510_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)That one had eaten. It must have gulped down the whole hand, ring and all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000510_LYNA<tab>(-Garde élancée-)Celui-là venait tout juste d'avaler un humain. Je ne pourrais souhaiter à personne une mort aussi horrible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)Everything all right, Captain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)Tout va bien, Lyna<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000530_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Quite all right, my lord. Just a stray sin eater, and a weak one at that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000530_LYNA<tab>Oui, Exarque. Ce n'était qu'un purgateur, mineur qui plus est. Rien d'inhabituel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I see. Weak or not, we should be on the lookout for more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)Tant mieux. Mais reste vigilante, il n'était peut-être pas seul.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But I see you've met my guest. I will escort <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to the Crystarium myself...if you've no objections?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)Quant à cette personne, c'est moi qui l'ai invitée. Tu ne vois pas d'objection à ce que je l'accompagne à l'intérieur, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000560_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Another of your mysterious friends, is it? I should have known.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000560_LYNA<tab>Je vois. Encore un de vos mystérieux amis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000570_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Very well. I'll inform the others your guest is to be given the run of the city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000570_LYNA<tab>Très bien, je dirai à mes hommes de <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> laisser entrer et sortir librement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000580_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Pray forgive my less-than-cordial welcome. May the rest of your stay with us be a pleasant one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000580_LYNA<tab>J'espère que vous ne m'en voudrez pas pour cet accueil un peu brutal. Sans rancune, et bon séjour à Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Come with me. I will answer whatever questions you have when we are somewhere more private.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)Ne restons pas ici. Tu as sûrement de nombreuses questions, et je préfère ne pas y répondre en public.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Right, then. Before we plunge into the wheres and wherefores, let me first thank you for answering my summons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)Avant toute chose, je voudrais te remercier du fond du cœur d'avoir répondu à mon appel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I had intended to bring you directly to my personal quarters, but I fear my aim was...slightly off. That you were still able to make the crossing unharmed is...a great relief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)En principe, tu aurais dû apparaître chez moi, mais j'ai fait une petite erreur de calcul... Enfin, ce qui compte, c'est que tu sois à mes côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so we come to the question of where. The realm in which you now find yourself belongs to one of the thirteen reflections or shards─the First, to be precise─even if its inhabitants are largely oblivious to the fact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)Sache que tu te trouves dans le premier des treize reflets du monde primitif, ton monde. À part toi et moi, personne ici n'a conscience de cette situation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As to wherefore... Having been awarded the rather grandiose title of “Crystal Exarch,” I─in my capacity as caretaker of the Crystarium─thought to seek the aid of you and your companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-Exarque-)Je suis l'exarque du Cristal. En tout cas, c'est ainsi que m'appellent les habitants de Cristarium, la petite colonie que j'ai fondée. Je suis aussi celui qui vous a invoqués ici, toi et tes amis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are the other Scions here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Les autres Héritiers sont ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do you have any idea how much trouble you've caused?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous avez créé le chaos chez nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah. That...is a question with no simple answer. But all shall be explained in due course, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Oui, mais la situation est pour le moins complexe. Si tu le permets, j'aimerais te l'expliquer petit à petit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...An inkling, yes. I can only beg your forgiveness─matters here forced my hand. But all shall be explained in due course, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'en suis ter<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment désolé, crois-moi. La situation ici m'a contraint à agir, et si tu le veux bien, je vais tout t'expliquer petit à petit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let us begin with the glaring skies up above.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mais d'abord, il y a quelque chose que tu dois savoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Here in the First, the world has been all but consumed by primordial Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ce monde est sur le point d'être anéanti par la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It began a century ago, by this realm's reckoning. A luminous flood swallowing everything in its path. More than nine-tenths of this star was lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il y a cent ans, un terrible cataclysme connu sous le nom de “déluge de Lumière” a ravagé la quasi-totalité de la planète.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And the fortunate few who survived are hounded by abominations born of that catastrophe even now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Depuis, la petite partie de la population qui a survécu subsiste tant bien que mal, menacée d'extinction par les monstres que la catastrophe a engendrés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"Sin eaters,“ we call them. The creature you saw earlier was one such monstrosity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nous les appelons les “purgateurs”, et la créature que Lyna a abattue tout à l'heure était l'un d'eux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It was to save the First from this menace that I learned to bridge the rift between worlds─that I might call upon the aid of the greatest of heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pour sauver mon peuple de ces abo<var 16 /var>mi<var 16 /var>na<var 16 /var>tions, j'ai acquis le savoir nécessaire pour relier les mondes et je t'ai <var 08 E905 ((invoquée)) ((invoqué)) /var>, toi, <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> plus <var 08 E905 ((puissante)) ((puissant)) /var> des <var 08 E905 ((héroïnes)) ((héros)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though it meant depriving a world of its champion, I had to try─for in saving the First, you would bring salvation to the Source as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Cela peut te paraître égoïste, mais tu comprendras vite que le salut du monde primitif est directement lié au destin de ce reflet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But what manner of host harangues his guest in the middle of the road? Let us continue our talk within the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Toutes ces émotions t'ont sûrement <var 08 E905 ((épuisée)) ((épuisé)) /var>. Viens, nous allons poursuivre notre con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion plus à l'aise, à Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Such a proud and vibrant city...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>L'endroit débordait d'activité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000750_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The sole sanctuary for the living in a world all but resigned to oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000750_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Au milieu d'un monde ravagé, cette colonie était le symbole même de la vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Each stone was laid with hope; the town itself a symbol, a monument to defiance in the face of death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Elle s'élevait tel un bastion, un bastion bâti par des hommes et des femmes qui tous avaient choisi de se dresser contre la fatalité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No would-be hero could fail to answer its call. For who among us does not yearn for salvation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Au carrefour des destins, elle incarnait une route nouvelle vers des horizons encore plus lointains...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Welcome to the Ocular, my private study. We can speak here without fear of being overheard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bienvenue dans L'Observatoire, mon petit cabinet personnel. Nous serons plus tranquilles ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have much to explain, but the truths which I must touch upon in doing so would cause only distress and confusion to the people of this world. Pray keep that in mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sache que les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions que je m'apprête à te divulguer ne sont connues de personne d'autre que moi dans ce monde. Je compte sur toi pour garder le secret.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now, I am sure you are desperate to know the fate of your fellow Scions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Très bien. Parlons de tes amis Héritiers, pour commencer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To put it simply, they are here in the First...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Comme toi, ils ont fait le voyage entre nos mondes et se sont retrouvés ici, dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Their arrival, however, was not as recent as you may imagine. Here, time flows at a different pace from that of the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Seulement, ça ne veut pas dire pour autant qu'ils viennent juste d'arriver. Entre le monde primitif et les reflets, il existe une certaine divergence temporelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the space of a single hour in your home world, an entire year might pass in the First─and the reverse could also be true. The pace fluctuates without rhyme or reason, and it cannot be predicted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Une heure écoulée dans votre monde peut être équivalente à une heure ici, mais ce n'est pas nécessairement le cas. Les fluctuations sont irrégulières et impossibles à prévoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That said, we seem to be entering a period of near-equivalence, and thus, for the moment, you need not overly concern yourself with the passage of time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Récemment, j'ai constaté que l'écart entre le passage du temps dans nos deux mondes avait tendance à se réduire. Nous n'aurons donc pas à nous en soucier dans l'immédiat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for your companions, however... Y'shtola and Urianger have dwelled here for three winters all told, while Thancred's count stands at five.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En ce qui concerne tes camarades, c'est Thancred qui est arrivé le premier, il y a environ cinq ans. Il a été suivi par Y'shtola et Urianger, deux années plus tard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Even our more “recent” arrivals, Alphinaud and Alisaie, have lived in the First for almost a year.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quant à Alphinaud et Alisaie, cela fait bientôt un an qu'ils sont parmi nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My intention had been to summon only you, but the art of reaching across worlds has proven exceedingly difficult to master. Thus it was that my <var 1A 02 /var>fumbling<var 1A 01 /var> hand closed upon those to whom your fate is most closely bound as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Crois-moi, je n'avais aucunement l'intention de les impliquer. Mais le procédé d'invocation est complexe, et j'ai commis quelques erreurs avant de viser juste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As they were not the object of my summons...their transference was...incomplete. Though they may appear to possess corporeal bodies, they are, in truth, merely spirits that one can see and touch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À cause de ces échecs relatifs, tes amis n'existent dans le premier reflet que sous une forme spectrale imparfaite. On peut les voir et les toucher, mais leur corps ne les a pas accompagnés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Consequently, while you yourself will be able to pass between worlds with relative freedom, they will not. Much as it grieves me...they are stranded here, unable to return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Con<var 16 /var>trai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment à toi, qui devrais être en mesure de voyager librement entre nos deux mondes, eux sont malheureusement incapables de rentrer par leurs propres moyens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then find a way to send them back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je veux que vous les renvoyiez chez eux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What have they been doing all this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il y a forcément un moyen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We spent every waking hour searching for a way to reverse the summoning. In the beginning, at least...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ce n'est pas faute d'avoir essayé... J'ai consacré beaucoup d'efforts à la recherche d'une méthode pour leur faire faire le voyage inverse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As you may have surmised, however, our efforts met with little success. And then we all but abandoned the endeavor once Urianger shared with us the vision he had witnessed during his journey through the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mais lorsqu'Urianger m'a confié avoir eu une vision lors du voyage qui l'a mené ici, j'ai dû revoir mes plans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In that chaotic no-man's-land between realms, time and space warp and blend in...unexpected ways. What Urianger saw...was the future. That which would one day come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Au sein des failles qui séparent les mondes, le temps et l'espace sont enchevêtrés de façon complexe. Là-bas... Urianger a vu le futur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In his vision of tomorrow, the First was rejoined with the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il a assisté à la réunification du monde primitif et du premier reflet, ainsi qu'à ses con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This collision of worlds brought about the Eighth Umbral Calamity, and the deaths of countless multitudes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dans sa vision, ton monde était ravagé par le “huitième fléau”, un cataclysme entraînant la mort d'un nombre incalculable d'innocents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Amongst those who perished, Urianger clearly saw the fall of the Scions' mightiest champion. He watched you die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Parmi les victimes, il a reconnu un visage qui l'a par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement marqué<var 1D /var>: celui <var 08 E905 ((de l'héroïne)) ((du héros)) /var> des Héritiers de la Septième Aube. Le tien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus did the Scions embrace their exile, and began searching this world for a means to forestall the coming catastrophe in yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tes camarades ont im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment pris la situation très au sérieux, et ils se sont mis à chercher un moyen d'éviter cette réunification.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Their souls are stranded in the First, yes, but they have fought on, desperate to save their home─and you─from destruction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Même si leur âme a quitté le monde primitif, ils n'ont cessé de se battre pour le protéger... et pour te sauver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nor have their efforts been in vain: for it was they who finally established that the elimination of the sin eaters will indeed serve to prevent the calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Au final, ils ont réalisé que les purgateurs sont une menace qui pèse sur nous tous. En les détruisant, notre monde pourrait survivre, la réunification serait évitée, et la catastrophe n'aurait jamais lieu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Considering the...circumstances of our meeting, you would be forgiven for doubting my version of events.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'ai conscience que ce que je viens de te raconter est difficile à croire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so, before all else, I would suggest you track down your comrades, and hear the tale from their lips.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Que dirais-tu d'aller à la rencontre des autres Héritiers présents dans le premier reflet pour en discuter avec eux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I shall, of course, be happy to assist in these reunions─and you need not make any decisions regarding your involvement until you are certain of where you stand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je ferai tout mon possible pour faciliter vos retrouvailles, et sois tranquille, je ne te forcerai pas la main. Si tu décides de rejoindre notre combat, ce sera ton choix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Meanwhile, I promise I will not rest until I have found a way to help your friends return home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quoi qu'il arrive, tu as ma parole que je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour renvoyer tes amis dans votre monde, quand le moment sera venu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>What say you? Have I earned your trust for the moment, at least?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je t'en donne ma parole, alors accorde-moi ta confiance, s'il te plaît.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>For the moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Très bien, pour le moment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aye, but I'll see you keep that promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je n'oublierai pas cette promesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>For want of a better choice...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Si c'est la seule solution...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Excellent. You will not regret this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci... Je te promets que je ne te décevrai pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With that settled, we shall have to see about getting you ready for the road.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je vais avoir besoin de régler quelques petits détails avant de prendre la route. Pourquoi ne pas en profiter pour reprendre des forces<var 1D /var>? Ce voyage a dû t'épuiser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Traveling across the rift has no doubt left you weary─I will arrange for a room where you might rest in comfort. While it's being prepared, perhaps I can show you around?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je t'ai fait préparer une chambre où tu pourras te reposer tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment. Suis-moi, je vais t'y accompagner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This is the Musica Universalis, the commercial heart of the Crystarium. Aught you might need to prepare for your journeys can be purchased here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nous voilà à Musica Universalis, le secteur commerçant de Cristarium. Tu y trouveras tout le nécessaire pour t'équiper.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, yes─you must be curious about the currency. Fear not! The gil you carry will serve you well enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Oh, ne t'en fais pas pour l'argent. La devise que tu as l'habitude d'utiliser a très cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment cours, ici aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Each nation once minted its own coins, but 'twas all a jumbled mess following the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Avant le déluge de Lumière, les gens se servaient de monnaies frappées dans les grandes nations. Mais la catastrophe a provoqué une grande confusion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>After much debate, the local merchants eventually elected to revert to the old ways, wherein a coin's value was decided by the worth of its metal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Après une période d'adaptation, c'est le système le plus ru<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>taire qui a primé<var 1D /var>: les pièces ont fini par être appréciées pour la valeur de leur métal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for a unit of measurement, we agreed upon the term “gil.” A word borrowed from coins uncovered within the Crystal Tower here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quand nous avons découvert des pièces d'Allag, une ancienne civilisation, à l'intérieur de la Tour de Cristal, nous nous en sommes inspirés pour baptiser notre unité monétaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And as our traders peddled their wares across the land, so too did our usage of gil become common practice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Depuis, les gils se sont répandus dans les régions limitrophes de Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>From what Y'shtola tells me, a standard coin from the Source equates to exactly one gil here─or near enough not to matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>D'après Y'shtola, c'est une monnaie du même nom qui est utilisée dans votre monde. Ces pièces devraient donc avoir une valeur sensiblement identique par chez nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Our way of life has benefited greatly from the artifacts we recovered from the tower...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À propos de découvertes, ce n'est pas la seule que nous avons faite dans la Tour de Cristal. Certaines ont même grandement amélioré notre quotidien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Some of which may be familiar to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je ne serais pas surpris que tu retrouves ici certains appareils ou objets que tu as l'habitude de manipuler...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But I fear it would not be practical for us to provide <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var> to which you are accustomed. You shall need a means to access the commodities of your home world...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Évidemment, l'idéal serait d'être en contact direct avec le monde primitif pour pouvoir faire venir ou envoyer tout ce dont tu as besoin. Hmmm...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>[Are you there, my friend?]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Mon amie, es-tu là<var 1D /var>?<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001180_FEOUL<tab>(-???-)Yes, I'm here, of course I'm here! What amusements do you have for me today?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001180_FEOUL<tab>(-???-)Oui, oui, bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Je suis toujours là quand on m'appelle<var 1D /var>! À quoi est-ce qu'on joue, aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My dear Feo Ul, paragon of pixie-kind. For you, I have the most vital task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bonjour, Feo Ul. J'ai besoin d'un service. Et comme tu es la plus talentueuse des Pixies que je connais, j'ai tout de suite pensé à toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This fine gentleman is a friend from a distant realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je te présente une personne qui est venue de très loin pour nous rendre visite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This fine lady is a friend from a distant realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je te présente une personne qui est venue de très loin pour nous rendre visite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And we have need of a means to ferry things back and forth from <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home. Might you be able to...assist us in this matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> apprécierait pouvoir envoyer et recevoir des objets de chez <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var>. Tu crois que tu peux l'y aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001230_FEOUL<tab>You came from beyond, didn't you!? From beyond the rift!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001230_FEOUL<tab>Ça alors<var 1D /var>! Tu es un de ces humains qui ont voyagé au-delà des confins de leur monde, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001240_FEOUL<tab>How wonderfully exciting! What a brave and reckless and marvelous thing you did! You've the heart of a pixie, you do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001240_FEOUL<tab>Il en faut du courage, pour faire une chose pareille<var 1D /var>! Nous autres Pixies, on n'est pas aussi téméraires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001250_FEOUL<tab>After careful consideration, I have decided to grant you my assistance. Make a pact with me, and the fun can begin!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001250_FEOUL<tab>Bien sûr que je peux t'aider<var 1D /var>! Il suffit juste que tu passes un pacte avec moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001260_FEOUL<tab>But answer me this, traveler: did your garments come with you when you crossed over? Your teeth? Your nails?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001260_FEOUL<tab>On est d'accord, tu n'as pas perdu de vêtement, de cheveux ou même un petit doigt en arrivant ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001270_FEOUL<tab>Just as I thought! Then you've a good, stout connection with your home, through which all your belongings great and small may easily pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001270_FEOUL<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Ça veut dire que toi et tout ce qui t'appartient pouvez faire la traversée sans problème<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001280_FEOUL<tab>From this moment forth, I will be your [beautiful branch], and you my [adorable sapling]. Like the branch which sprouts from the sapling, our bond will flow unbroken from one to the other!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001280_FEOUL<tab>À partir de maintenant, tu seras mon <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>petit arbrisseau<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> et je serai ta <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>jolie branchette<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Rien ne pourra nous séparer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001290_FEOUL<tab>Raise your hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001290_FEOUL<tab>Tends ta main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001300_FEOUL<tab>'Tis done! We are bound now, dearest sapling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001300_FEOUL<tab>Et voilà<var 1D /var>! À partir de maintenant, tu es mon petit arbrisseau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001310_FEOUL<tab>Come, come, then! Make your request! Tell me your desire! I wish to visit this world of yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001310_FEOUL<tab>Alors, qu'est-ce qui te ferait plaisir<var 1D /var>? J'ai hâte de voir d'où tu viens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mayhap a message to your friends in the Source to inform them of your safe arrival?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Que dirais-tu de contacter ceux de ton monde pour leur dire que tu es bien <var 08 E905 ((arrivée)) ((arrivé)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Who will you contact?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Qui voulez-vous contacter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Send a message to Tataru.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tataru

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Send a message to Krile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Krile

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001330_FEOUL<tab>Consider it done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001330_FEOUL<tab>Entendu. J'y vais de ce pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As you heard, that was Feo Ul of the pixies. Their kind possess an affinity for magic akin to that of arcane beings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Feo Ul appartient à la famille des Pixies, des créatures magiques au caractère par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement jovial.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They rarely show themselves in populated areas, but Feo is insatiably curious even by pixie standards, and seems to have taken a liking to the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>D'ordinaire, on ne les voit pas trop se mêler aux humains, mais celle-ci adore se promener à Cristarium pour satisfaire sa curiosité débordante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Right, we were going to organize a room for you, weren't we? Come along.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bon, il est grand temps que je te montre ta chambre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001370_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001370_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)...You...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Cette silhouette...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)I know you... You're the Warrior of Light from the Source!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Je te reconnais<var 1D /var>! Tu es <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> de la Lumière du monde primitif<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que tu fais ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Warrior of Darkness...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Le Guerrier des Ténèbres...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>And who are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>On se connaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001400_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)What? Did you just... You can hear me!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001400_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Hein<var 1D /var>!? Tu peux entendre ma voix<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Oh, gods, how long has it been...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)C'est impossible... Qu'est-ce que ça veut dire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)...Aye...aye, that was what I called myself in your world... The “Warrior of Darkness.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Le Guerrier des Ténèbres... C'est comme ça que je me faisais appeler, dans ton monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My real name is Ardbert. I used an alias in the Source. A daft one, looking back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Mon vrai nom est Ardbert. La prononciation est presque identique à celle du nom que j'utilisais dans le monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)...“And who are you?” <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> says. An enemy not worth remembering, apparently...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Tu ne te souviens pas de moi, hein... On dirait que je n'ai pas été un adversaire suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment mémorable pour te marquer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001450_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My name is Ardbert. In the First, I was a Warrior of Light, but in the Source you knew me as the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001450_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Mon nom est Ardbert. J'étais le Guerrier de la Lumière du premier reflet, et le meneur des Guerriers des Ténèbres que tu as terrassés dans le monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you recall my tale, it was my comrades and I who caused the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ce sont nos actions qui ont provoqué le déluge de Lumière dans ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We thought our home doomed. And so we listened to the Ascians─let them guide us to the Source, and tried to hasten their godsdamned Ardor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nous étions prêts à tout sacrifier pour les nôtres. Nous avons donc laissé les Asciens nous guider jusqu'au monde primitif dans l'espoir de le fusionner avec ses reflets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001480_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I remember when we fell, defeated by you and yours. I remember our audience with Minfilia─how she listened to our pleas, and returned our souls to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001480_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>C'est là que tu nous as vaincus, mais nous y avons aussi rencontré la prêtresse de la Lumière, Minfilia, qui a escorté nos âmes dans notre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The Flood was poised to swallow Norvrandt...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>À notre retour, le déluge de Lumière était sur le point d'engloutir Norvrandt, le dernier continent encore épargné.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia and my friends, they...they surrendered what little they had left to hold it back. Just faded away...leaving me to bear witness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Mes amis ont combiné leur énergie avec celle de Minfilia pour l'empêcher, et leurs âmes se sont consumées. Je me suis retrouvé seul dans ce monde désolé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tell me, do you know the year? How much time has passed since we caused the Flood?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dis, combien de temps s'est écoulé depuis le déluge de Lumière<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>A hundred years... A hundred long years...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Cent ans<var 1D /var>? Une éternité...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My hands find no purchase. My gestures catch no eye. And my pleas, be they whispered or screamed, reach not a single ear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je ne peux plus toucher les choses, et personne ne me voit. J'ai beau crier de toutes mes forces, ma voix n'est jamais entendue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I am a shade, cursed to do naught but drift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>J'erre dans ce monde, mais c'est comme si je n'en faisais plus partie. Je ne suis qu'un fantôme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I feel as if I've been walking forever... I hardly noticed when my mind and body began to fray at the edges.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je me rappelle avoir marché, beaucoup marché... J'ai tant vagabondé que j'ai fini par oublier où j'étais, et même <var 1A 02 /var>qui<var 1A 01 /var> j'étais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Then “bang,” my senses were sharp again. I felt like a fish being reeled in, and before I knew it, I found myself in this room.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Mais un peu plus tôt, ma conscience s'est éclaircie d'un seul coup. J'ai eu le sentiment d'être attiré par quelque chose, et avant que je m'en rende compte, j'étais ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Why is it that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can see me? What are you even doing here, come to that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Comment tu peux me voir<var 1D /var>? En fait, j'ai déjà du mal à comprendre ce que tu fais dans notre monde...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You were summoned to save the First?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>On t'a <var 08 E905 ((invoquée)) ((invoqué)) /var> pour sauver le premier reflet, hein...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>A waste of time. This world is beyond saving─like those who try to save it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>C'est inutile... Ce monde est condamné, et ceux qui sont assez fous pour tenter de le sauver courent à leur perte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Muddled as my mind may be, I've not forgotten that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Moi, en tout cas, j'ai déjà donné. J'ai erré si longtemps sur ces terres que j'en ai oublié la raison qui m'avait poussé à me battre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But if fate has brought me to you─the one person in this godsforsaken world who can see and hear me─then perhaps there is a reason I endured.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Cela dit... Je ne sais pas comment nos routes se sont croisées, ou pourquoi tu es la seule personne à me voir. Mais il y a peut-être un sens à tout ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If I can find out why I was left behind, then maybe...maybe I can bring this journey of mine to an end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je veux savoir pourquoi je suis le seul à avoir survécu. Je veux savoir, pour enfin mettre un terme à cette existence sans but.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well. I'll be watching, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je garderai un œil sur toi pendant quelque temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But do me a favor. Be careful out there. This world has had its fill of heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Juste un conseil... prends garde à toi. Les héros ne sont plus les bienvenus, dans ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, how did you find your new quarters? I trust you were able to rest?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alors, comment as-tu trouvé ta chambre<var 1D /var>? J'espère que tu as pu te reposer un peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well enough, thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oui, à peu près.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I had a ghostly visitor...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai vu un fantôme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That is good to hear. Should you want for anything, pray let me know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tant mieux. S'il y a quoi que ce soit que je puisse faire, n'hésite pas à me le dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I...was not aware the room was haunted. And...you <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> rather tired... Well, should you receive another visitation, be sure to let me know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>!? C'est très étonnant... S'il y a quoi que ce soit que je puisse faire, n'hésite pas à me le dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now, let us return to the subject of the Scions' whereabouts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il est temps que je t'explique où se trouvent tes camarades des Héritiers de la Septième Aube.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This map shows the lands of Norvrandt, the only area to be spared the Flood of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ceci est une repré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion récente de Norvrandt, le dernier territoire qui n'a pas été englouti par le déluge de Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The Crystarium is here, in the region known as Lakeland.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Là, c'est Grand-Lac, la région où nous nous trouvons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To the north is the faerie kingdom of Il Mheg. That is where you will find Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Au nord, tu as Il Mheg, le royaume féérique. C'est là que se trouve ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To the east lies the once-prosperous civilization of Rak'tika. Y'shtola is stationed there, in the heart of the forest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Y'shtola s'est installée à Rak'tika, une forêt à la splendeur ancestrale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alas, neither location can be reached without considerable difficulty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ce sont des contrées reculées qui demandent certains préparatifs pour être ralliées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As such, I would suggest you first seek out one of the twins─each of whom is stationed but a short flight from the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il me semble plus sage d'aller à la rencontre de tes amis qui sont dans des régions proches d'ici, accessibles à dos de monture volante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alphinaud is on Kholusia, an island off the western shore. It is home to a city called Eulmore, where the rich and privileged while away their days in idleness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alphinaud a choisi l'île de Kholusia, à l'ouest. C'est là-bas que se trouve Eulmore, la cité des nobles et des riches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For his part in furthering our cause, Alphinaud journeyed there to meet with the citizenry and forge alliances. From what I hear, he has since kept himself busy gathering information around the main settlement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>D'après ce que j'ai compris, il compte y user de ses qualités de diplomate pour obtenir des ren<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments qui pourraient vous être utiles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alisaie, meanwhile, traveled south to the arid wastes of Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sa sœur, elle, a préféré se rendre en Amh Araeng, une région méridionale aux terres asséchées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They lie upon the very edge of the inhabitable world, where the Flood of Light was halted. Those who dwell there live in constant fear of attack by the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il s'agit de la dernière zone habitée avant les immenses étendues dévastées par le déluge de Lumière, et les purgateurs y sont nombreux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In contrast to her brother, Alisaie felt that her energies would better be spent learning about the enemy. And thus she sells her services as a guard, both to hone her skills and gather information on our foe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Con<var 16 /var>trai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment à son frère, Alisaie a préféré commencer par étudier nos ennemis pour mieux les vaincre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So, will it be Kholusia or Amh Araeng? It matters not which you choose to visit first.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Libre à toi de choisir où te rendre en premier. Sur l'île de Kholusia pour rejoindre Alphinaud, ou en Amh Araeng pour Alisaie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Simply inform me once you have made your decision, and I will see to it that you are provided with a suitable mount.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fais-moi signe lorsque tu voudras partir et je ferai le nécessaire pour te procurer un moyen de transport.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, but you must be wondering about Thancred. He has taken up with...a new companion, and is presently engaged as a wandering hunter of sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, j'allais oublier Thancred<var 1D /var>! Aux dernières nouvelles, il aurait trouvé un partenaire avec qui il chasse les purgateurs sans relâche...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Being ever on the move, his whereabouts are often difficult to ascertain, but I am certain your paths will cross ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Cela me paraît difficile d'aller le retrouver dans l'immédiat, mais je suis sûr que vos routes se croiseront à un moment ou un autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001840_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The whistling breeze, mute. The pounding surf, frozen. Time itself takes a breath...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001840_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sous la douce caresse de la brise marine et le tumulte des vagues, le temps s'était comme arrêté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001850_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>At Light's edge, all is perfectly still. The world captured in a painting; locked in a moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001850_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>L'île tout entière semblait s'être atrophiée sous le poids de la Lumière qui l'accablait, comme une peinture figée à jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001860_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Music, faint and fleeting, drifts coastward on the lifeless air...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001860_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Portée par le vent, une gracieuse mélodie parvenait timidement à mes oreilles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001870_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And in the distance, beyond the broken earth, a city beckons...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001870_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Entre moi et la cité à l'horizon, il ne restait plus que la lande, immense et désertique.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-???-)And how is business today, Mistress Theva?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-Voix familière-)Comment allez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001890_THEVA<tab>Oh, frenetic. Look. I have a new customer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001890_THEVA<tab>Bienvenue. Tu sais quoi<var 1D /var>? Nous avons une nouvelle tête, aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001900_ALPHINAUD<tab>...'Tis good to see you, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça pour une surprise... J'espère ne pas m'être trop fait attendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001910_ALPHINAUD<tab>The barley seeds you wanted. They should produce a better harvest than the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001910_ALPHINAUD<tab>Voici les grains de blé que vous m'aviez demandés. Ils devraient vous donner encore plus de beaux épis que la dernière fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001920_THEVA<tab>What, just like that? Oh, Alphinaud, you really are a dear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001920_THEVA<tab>Je n'en espérais pas tant<var 1D /var>! Merci Alphinaud, ton aide est toujours la bienvenue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001930_THEVA<tab>Well, I'd best be tidying up some of those empty shacks before the pests move in. Keep an eye on the place while I'm out, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001930_THEVA<tab>Je dois aller débarrasser les maisons vides. Faites comme chez vous pendant ce temps-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001940_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems an age since last we spoke. Not since the prisoner exchange in Doma. And Yotsuyu...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001940_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai l'impression que notre dernière rencontre remonte à une éternité. C'était lors de cet échange de prisonniers à Doma, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001950_ALPHINAUD<tab>It has been even longer for me, of course, if you count the days I have spent here. But the time has only added to the relief I feel, seeing you safe and well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Voilà un certain temps que je suis arrivé dans le premier reflet, et j'ai tendance à perdre mes repères. Quel soulagement de vous voir en bonne santé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Me? I was more worried about you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je me suis beaucoup <var 08 E905 ((inquiétée)) ((inquiété)) /var> pour vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We thought we'd lost you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous retrouver n'a pas été chose facile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hah! Alisaie said much the same thing. I don't think I've ever had such a scolding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ha... C'est exactement ce que m'a dit Alisaie lorsque nous nous sommes retrouvés. Il y avait longtemps que je ne m'étais pas fait gronder comme ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I believe an exchange of news is in order. Come─tell me of your arrival, and all that came before!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nymeia soit louée, nous voilà à nouveau réunis. Vous devez avoir tant d'histoires à me raconter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>I see. Both the Exarch and Alisaie told me what they knew of events, but I had stubbornly clung on to the hope that all-out war might yet be avoidable...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Une guerre ouverte avec l'empire de Garlemald... Cela concorde avec ce que disaient ma sœur et l'exarque du Cristal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001990_ALPHINAUD<tab>And poor Tataru─she must be sick with worry. We must endeavor to return as soon as we may...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quant à notre pauvre Tataru, je suis désolé de lui avoir causé tant de souci. J'espère que nous pourrons bientôt tous la retrouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001991_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould be nice to bring her good tidings for a change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001991_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avec d'excellentes nouvelles, bien sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002000_ALPHINAUD<tab>But before we bid this world farewell, we must first ensure that it is not rejoined to the Source. We must prevent the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avant tout, nous devons nous préoccuper de l'éventuelle réunification du premier reflet avec notre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger's vision of the future has, I fear, every chance of coming true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002010_ALPHINAUD<tab>D'après moi, il est tout à fait possible que la vision d'Urianger devienne réalité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002020_ALPHINAUD<tab>By his description, the catalyst for the Calamity was a formless and deadly weapon employed by the Garlean Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans le futur qu'il a entrevu, le huitième fléau qui ravageait le monde primitif prenait la forme d'une arme invisible de l'Empire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Which can only mean one thing: Black Rose. Gaius was telling you the truth. When we were on the trail of the Ascians, we saw evidence that the gas was being manufactured once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il s'agit forcément de la rose noire. En compagnie de Gaius, j'ai eu l'occasion de constater que sa production avait été relancée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gaius was adamant that the project had been scrapped. But so long as there are wars to be waged, there will always be those determined to win by any means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et je sais qu'il en avait ordonné la destruction quand on l'appelait encore le loup noir. Hélas, tant qu'il y aura des guerres, ce genre d'arme sera toujours d'actualité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>And thus simply destroying the existing stores of Black Rose would do little to alter fate's course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Même si nous parvenions à anéantir la rose noire dans notre monde, je doute que cela règle vraiment notre problème.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002060_ALPHINAUD<tab>In that sense, our involuntary journey here to the First was something of a boon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce sens, on peut dire que c'est une chance d'avoir été appelés dans le premier reflet<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Together with the Exarch, we've developed a theory as to how we believe the Rejoining will be set in motion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Grâce à notre rencontre avec l'exarque du Cristal, nous savons désormais ce qui menace de provoquer la réunification de ce monde avec le nôtre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002080_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am sure Urianger himself will cover the subject in more detail...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger saurait mieux vous l'expliquer, mais je vais tout de même essayer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I can tell you the process requires that both worlds─the Source and the First─be facing an existential threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce phénomène de réunification se produit lorsque le monde primitif et un de ses reflets font tous les deux face à un désastre de grande ampleur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002100_ALPHINAUD<tab>One being sin eaters, of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ici, la menace est représentée par ces créatures que les habitants appellent “purgateurs”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>They are a menace that I would dearly love to remove, and not just to avert a calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous pouvez me croire, j'ai bien l'intention de faire tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour éviter que le pire ne se produise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>I may be a stranger to this world, but I will not stand idly by and let innocent people be slaughtered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Même si ce monde n'est pas le mien, il est hors de question que je reste sans rien faire en voyant tous ces gens souffrir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>That is what brought me to the gates of Eulmore. Ignoring its pretentions as a kind of capital city to what remains of the world, it is nonetheless a center of power and authority.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Par conséquent, j'ai décidé de me rendre à Eulmore, le centre politique de cette terre selon toute vraisemblance. Notre action devrait y trouver écho.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>If any solutions are to be found, I believe our search should begin there. What say you, old friend? Hungry for another adventure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Que diriez-vous de m'y accompagner<var 1D /var>? Ensemble, nous serons plus à même d'être écoutés et de trouver des alliés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>And so we take to the road once more!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Me voilà comblé<var 1D /var>! Pour tout vous dire, voyager en votre compagnie m'avait ter<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment manqué.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>That gate up ahead is known as the “Open Arms,” and Eulmore itself lies beyond.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Au fond, vous pouvez apercevoir les “Bras ouverts”. C'est le nom qu'ont donné les Eulmoriens aux portes de leur ville.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>This, meanwhile, is the aptly named “Gatetown.” The dwelling place of the many desperate souls who hope to be chosen to live in the city proper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Devant nous, c'est le “Vestibule”. Les personnes qui occupent ce campement espèrent être choisies pour vivre à Eulmore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002180_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Oh! I thought I recognized you. Brought a new friend, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002180_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Regardez qui voilà<var 1D /var>! Dis donc gamin, t'as ramené une nouvelle tête, aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002190_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Heh heh heh heh... I'll bet you've got a trick or two up your sleeve. Maybe even <var 1A 02 /var>three<var 1A 01 /var>! Care to show me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002190_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Hé hé... Les gens qui ont du talent sont toujours les bienvenus. Alors, c'est quoi ta spécialité<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>He's not here to compete. Leave him be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il n'est pas venu ici pour vivre à Eulmore, donc il ne vous dérangera pas. Laissez-le tranquille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>She's not here to compete. Leave her be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Elle n'est pas venue ici pour vivre à Eulmore, donc elle ne vous dérangera pas. Laissez-la tranquille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002220_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>What!? I was only making conversation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002220_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>J'étais juste curieux, c'est pas une raison pour être désagréable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002230_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>(-???-)Ladies and gentlemen! Your attention pleeease!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002230_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>(-???-)Oyez oyez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002240_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Greetings to our hopeful petitioners, one and all! Eulmore extends its warmest regards!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002240_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Comment allez-vous, très chers candidats à la citoyenneté eulmorienne<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002250_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Let it be known that a lady of distinction wishes to dine on fish divine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002250_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Aujourd'hui, nous sommes ici car une noble dame meurt d'envie de déguster un délicieux plat à base de poisson<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002260_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>We seek a master culinarian who can guarantee seafood perfection! Dazzle the matron with your delicious dishes, and life in the city will be yours to enjoy. Even on days when fish is not on the menu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002260_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Celui ou celle qui saura cuisiner selon ses attentes gagnera le droit de vivre à la ville pour le restant de ses jours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002270_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Who among you will answer the call? Name yourself or another, we mind not at all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002270_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Alors, qui se sent à la hauteur<var 1D /var>? N'hésitez pas à vous proposer, ou à nous présenter la personne idéale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002280_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Fish, is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002280_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Du poisson...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002290_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Was there anyone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002290_GATETOWNMAN<tab>On a un cuistot<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002300_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>What about that girl?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002300_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>Et pourquoi pas elle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do you recall how I said Eulmore was a center of power and authority? Well, that is not the only reason for its fame.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vous ai dit qu'Eulmore était le centre politique de ce monde, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? À vrai dire, cette cité est aussi connue sous un autre nom.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002320_ALPHINAUD<tab>It is also known as the “city of final pleasures.” The noble and the wealthy who survived the Flood gathered here to live out the rest of their days in decadent abandon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002320_ALPHINAUD<tab>La ville des derniers plaisirs... L'endroit où les riches et les nobles ayant survécu au déluge de Lumière viennent profiter du temps qu'il leur reste à vivre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002330_ALPHINAUD<tab>A poor man could sooner pass through the eye of a needle than Eulmore's gates. The only way the commonfolk can enter this perverted paradise is if they fulfill the whim of one of the privileged. And so they are picked over like market produce...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les gens ordinaires qui aspirent à ce paradis n'ont d'autre espoir que d'être choisis pour un don ou un talent particulier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002340_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Ohoho! What a catch! We'll not be throwing this one back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002340_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Oui, c'est pas mal du tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002350_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Having seen your all-too-obvious charms, we welcome you with open arms! Come, join us in the city of splendor, and live out your life in an ecstasy of endeavor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002350_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Nous t'emmenons avec nous à Eulmore<var 1D /var>! À partir d'aujourd'hui, tu vas pouvoir exprimer tes talents de cuisinière dans notre paradis sur terre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002360_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Ah, just look at those expectant faces! What could you <var 1A 02 /var>possibly<var 1A 01 /var> be waiting for!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002360_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Regardez-moi tous ces visages impatients<var 1D /var>! Ne vous en faites pas, nous savons très bien ce que vous attendez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002370_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Well, well, what have we here!? An extra share of meol to celebrate our newest resident!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002370_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Pour accompagner le départ de notre dernière élue, c'est l'heure de la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion de méol<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002380_CLOWNOFRED<tab>For you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002380_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002390_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Enjoy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002390_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Régalez-vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002391_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Ah, at last!
