target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002391_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>C'est ce que j'attendais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002392_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Thank goodness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002392_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Ce n'est pas de refus.ALT<var 1D /var>: Merci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002393_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>Over here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002393_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>Moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Meol” is a foodstuff which Eulmore routinely doles out to the people of Gatetown, and apparently a staple for its citizens as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce “méol” est distribué gratuitement par Eulmore aux habitants du Vestibule. Il paraît que c'est aussi l'aliment principal à l'intérieur de la cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Many here rely on it to survive in these times of scarcity. Yet the whole arrangement just seems...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans un monde où la nourriture est rare, nombreux sont les habitants qui vivent en complète dépendance de ces repas gratuits.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002411_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, let us just say it leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002411_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pour autant, je n'arrive pas à adhérer à cette pratique...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>There you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, te voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>The thief who claimed the harvest on <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> behalf. Hand it over.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu as quelque chose qui m'appartient, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? J'aimerais que tu me le rendes, car je vais en avoir besoin pour une transaction très importante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002440_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)Wha─ I...I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002440_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)Ah, euh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002450_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)Forgive me, I just─ I have to get into the city!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002450_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)Pardonnez-moi... J'ai fait ça pour entrer dans Eulmorrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002460_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)I have no family, and all my friends have already been chosen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002460_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)Je n'ai plus de famille, et mes amis ont tous été choisis pour vivrrre dans la ville.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002470_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)No one here gives a damn about me. When the meol gets handed out, I'm lucky if I get a smell of it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002470_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)Je suis toujours seul, et lorrrs des dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tions de méol, je ne reçois que des miettes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002480_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)No matter what I do, they won't call out my name! I'm so tired─I'm so <var 1A 02 /var>bloody<var 1A 01 /var> hungry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002480_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)Quoi que je fasse, perrrsonne ne me recommande. J'ai faim, et je n'ai pas pu m'en empêcher...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002490_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)I thought maybe I could steal your idea─get in that way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002490_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)J'ai décidé de saisirrr ma chance, quoi qu'il m'en coûte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>...What is your name?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Comment t'appelles-tu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002510_KAISHIRR<tab>Kai-Shirr...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002510_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Mystel aux cheveux bleus-)Kai-Shirr...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tell me then, Kai-Shirr─must it be Eulmore or nothing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dis-moi, Kai-Shirr. Est-ce que vivre à Eulmore est la seule solution, pour toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>What of the Crystarium? They may not offer charity, but you would be fairly compensated for any work you did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu pourrais aller à Cristarium, par exemple. Il n'y a pas de dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion de méol là-bas, mais on peut y travailler pour recevoir de la nourriture en échange.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002540_KAISHIRR<tab>No, no, it has to be Eulmore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002540_KAISHIRR<tab>Non, c'est impossible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002550_KAISHIRR<tab>That's where all my friends are. We made a promise that we'd live together in paradise...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002550_KAISHIRR<tab>Mes amis sont à Eulmorrre, et nous nous sommes promis de tous y vivre ensemble, un jour...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002560_ALPHINAUD<tab>...I was to make my deal with the Ondo at the Clave. Listen carefully, and I shall tell you my plans for the business, and how best to arouse the Eulmorans' interest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je m'apprêtais à faire un échange avec les Ondos, au phare du Clavis. Tu veux y aller à ma place<var 1D /var>? Il te suffira de dire que tu viens de ma part.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002570_KAISHIRR<tab>You'll give me your place? Just like that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002570_KAISHIRR<tab>Vrrraiment, vous feriez ça pour moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>I'm giving you a chance, nothing more. What comes of it is entirely up to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Considère ça comme un petit coup de pouce. Une fois la transaction terminée, ce sera à toi de trouver comment vendre ce que tu auras obtenu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002590_KAISHIRR<tab>...I understand! Oh thank you, thank you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002590_KAISHIRR<tab>Merrrci beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>This was but one path─there will be others. But for young Kai-Shirr, it was the difference between life and death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il ne s'agit que d'une simple enquête pour nous, et d'autres occasions se présenteront. Mais aux yeux de ce garçon, c'est l'opportunité de toute une vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002610_ALPHINAUD<tab>I do not regret my decision...yet I will admit that a part of me wonders if it was for the best.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne regrette pas de lui avoir fait ce don, et je prierai pour qu'il réussisse. Mais était-ce vraiment le bon choix<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002620_ALPHINAUD<tab>We strive to bring swift salvation to this world, that countless lives might be saved─not least your own. Even if it came at the cost of one man, should I have forged on regardless...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si nous ne sauvons pas ce monde le plus vite possible, de nombreuses personnes mourront, vous y compris. Ma gentillesse nous perdra peut-être...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>That's not who you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous pouvez être fier de votre geste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quite possibly. Meaning we'd better hurry up and think of a new plan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>N'y pensons plus et allons de l'avant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002630_ALPHINAUD<tab>I suppose not... Were Estinien here, he would most likely scoff at my soft-heartedness. “Same old Alphinaud. Ever the slave to sentiment.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous le pensez vraiment<var 1D /var>? Si Estinien était là, je suis sûr qu'il ne se serait pas gêné pour me réprimander...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I thank you for your kind words, nonetheless. Let us see to it that both these stories have a happy ending.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais je vous remercie. Nous allons faire de notre mieux afin de trouver un dénouement heureux, pour eux comme pour nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We will find another way, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, vous avez raison. Notre combat ne fait que commencer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Shall we return to Wright, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Rentrons d'abord à Cherpant, si vous le voulez bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tiens...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can't be sure, but I-I think someone's in trouble!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>On dirait qu'il y a quelqu'un d'étendu sur le sol, là-bas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come on, they may need our help!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il a dû se passer quelque chose. Vite, allons voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002700_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Redemption is beyond us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002700_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ce monde est condamné...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The lament of all but saints and fools...and the comfort of the lords and ladies of this accursed place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Qui croyait encore le contraire<var 1D /var>? Les fous... les saints... et eux, les habitants de cette ville.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Once, they held fast against the madness, only to embrace the coming cataclysm and delight in the end of days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>À la veille de la fin du monde, cette cité solidement ancrée sur la mer était plus gaie que jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Perhaps in rapture they seek to lose themselves and the misery they share...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ses habitants masquaient-ils leur tristesse en jouant la comédie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or perhaps for them alone the promise of eternal pleasure really does hold true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ou avaient-ils trouvé un paradis où l'éternité leur était promise<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002750_DULIACHAI<tab>Ooh? Who's this then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002750_DULIACHAI<tab>À qui ai-je l'honneurrr<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord and Lady Chai, pray forgive our intrusion. I am given to understand you were in search...of an <var 1A 02 /var>artist<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Enchanté de vous rencontrer. À moins que je ne fasse erreur, vous êtes Monsieur et Madame Chai, et vous désirez vous attacher les services d'un peintre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002770_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ahh, you must be the new, uh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002770_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ah, c'est donc vous que nous attendions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002780_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, goodness me! What an adorable boy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002780_DULIACHAI<tab>Oooh, quel charrrmant jeune homme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002790_DULIACHAI<tab>That silken hair, those pearly cheeks...oh, and you even smell wonderful─like a bed of flowers!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002790_DULIACHAI<tab>Ces cheveux ondoyants, ce visage rrraffiné... Et quel délicieux parfum de bouquet fleuri<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002800_DULIACHAI<tab>I approve of this one, dearest! I am <var 1A 02 /var>positive<var 1A 01 /var> he will paint us the most delightful pictures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002800_DULIACHAI<tab>Mon chéri, ce garçon me plaît beaucoup. Je suis sûre qu'il va peindre de merrrveilleux tableaux pour nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>I, um, er, y-yes... Ahem. Well, as long as he paints better than that talentless wretch we sent packing last week...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Euh, oui... En tout cas, il ne peut pas être pirrre que ce barbouilleur ennuyeux et sans talent que nous avons renvoyé l'autre jour...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002820_DULIACHAI<tab>Wonderful, wonderful! Welcome to Eulmore...um, er...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002820_DULIACHAI<tab>Nous plaçons de grrrands espoirs en vous... Euh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alphinaud, if it please you, my lady. And this...is my assistant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mon nom est Alphinaud. Madame, Monsieur, mon assistant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> et moi sommes à votre entière disposition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Your...assistant? I've heard of folk bringing in family members, but this seems a bit irregular. Aren't you a little young to have a protégé?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Il est frrréquent que les gens de votre genre s'installent à Eulmore avec leur famille, mais c'est la première fois que je vois quelqu'un de votre âge accompagné d'une aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002850_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are family in all but name, my lord. Though we share no blood, we have stood by each other through life's many challenges, resolved to prevail together─or not at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002850_ALPHINAUD<tab>À vrai dire, je considère cette personne comme ma famille. Même si nous ne sommes pas du même sang, <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> est toujours à mes côtés quand j'ai besoin <var 08 E905 ((d'elle)) ((de lui)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of all people, 'tis he who best understands my work. With his unique insight guiding my hand, the art I create is sure to satisfy your expectations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et puis, il a cette faculté de comprendre mieux que quiconque ma peinture. Avec lui à mes côtés, je serai plus que jamais à même de satisfaire vos exigences.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002870_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of all people, 'tis she who best understands my work. With her unique insight guiding my hand, the art I create is sure to satisfy your expectations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002870_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et puis, elle a cette faculté de comprendre mieux que quiconque ma peinture. Avec elle à mes côtés, je serai plus que jamais à même de satisfaire vos exigences.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once the picture is begun, of course, I shall have no need of constant encouragement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002880_ALPHINAUD<tab>En fait, j'aurai surtout besoin <var 08 E905 ((d'elle)) ((de lui)) /var> pour les dernières touches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>And so I wondered, rather than <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> being in your way, might it then be permissible for my assistant to explore the city <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has so longed to see?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>L'autoriseriez-vous à visiter Eulmore pendant que je travaille sur ma toile<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Out of gratitude for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> <var 1A 02 /var>priceless<var 1A 01 /var> contribution to my art, I thought it only fair that I make this humble request on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> behalf.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pour <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> récompenser de tous ses efforts à mon service, j'aimerais qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> découvre sans attendre la ville qui l'a tant fait rêver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002910_DULIACHAI<tab>Oooh, did you ever hear of such devotion! Of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> your assistant must have <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> wish! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> shall be free to roam to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> heart's content!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002910_DULIACHAI<tab>Quelle délicate attention<var 1D /var>! Si ce n'est que ça, qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> prrrenne tout le temps nécessaire pour apprécier notre splendide cité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002920_DULIACHAI<tab>...Isn't that right, darling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002920_DULIACHAI<tab>Tu es d'accorrrd avec moi, n'est-ce pas mon chéri<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002930_CHAINUZZ<tab>Uh... Oh, yes. Yes, of course, dearest. Q-Quite right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002930_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ah, euh... Oui, tout ce que tu voudras, mon grrros chaton...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002940_ALPHINAUD<tab>That's him. That's Vauthry!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002940_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est Vauthry, le gouverneur d'Eulmore<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002950_ALPHINAUD<tab>He is attended by sin eaters...? But how does he keep them from attacking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les purgateurs qui l'entourent ont l'air doux comme des agneaux... C'est donc ça, son pouvoir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002960_KAISHIRR<tab>(-???-)Mercy... Mercy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002960_KAISHIRR<tab>(-???-)Urgh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Non...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kai-Shirr! What happened to you!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est Kai-Shirr<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002990_VAUTHRY<tab>Who are these impudent louts? I do not recall requesting their presence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002990_VAUTHRY<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Petits insolents, comment osez-vous<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord Vauthry! What is the meaning of this? Why is this poor man bleeding to death on your floor!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Don Vauthry<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-il arrivé à ce jeune garçon<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003010_VAUTHRY<tab>Why? You ask me why? Because criminals must be punished, and this man is guilty of fraud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003010_VAUTHRY<tab>Il a péché, et a été puni en conséquence. Quoi de plus naturel<var 1D /var>? C'est tout ce qu'un petit menteur comme lui mérite...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003020_VAUTHRY<tab>He came to us claiming to be a man of business, yet his subsequent conduct has shown him to be anything but!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003020_VAUTHRY<tab>Je l'ai invité ici car on me l'a présenté comme un habile commerçant, mais dès qu'il ouvre la bouche, il n'en sort que des mensonges.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003030_VAUTHRY<tab>Eulmore is a city built on love for one's fellow man. Those who have naught to give and live only to take are a blight upon our society!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003030_VAUTHRY<tab>Eulmore est une cité qui a été construite sur l'entraide et l'amour. Ceux qui viennent recevoir sans donner ne sont rien d'autre que les rebuts de ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003040_VAUTHRY<tab>To atone for this crime, I ordered that he fling himself from the balcony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003040_VAUTHRY<tab>C'est pour ça que je lui ai ordonné de se jeter de là-bas. Une punition tout à fait adaptée à son imposture, vous en conviendrez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003050_VAUTHRY<tab>And he had the <var 1A 02 /var>temerity<var 1A 01 /var> to weep! “Please, my lord! Anything but that!”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003050_VAUTHRY<tab>Et voilà qu'il se met à pleurer, à me supplier<var 1D /var>: “je vous en prie, pardonnez-moi”<var 1D /var>! “Ouin ouin, ouin”<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003060_VAUTHRY<tab>What then is a man of mercy to do, but offer the sinner another way to show his contrition?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003060_VAUTHRY<tab>Dans toute la bonté qui me caractérise, je me devais de lui donner une dernière chance de prouver sa sincérité, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003070_ALPHINAUD<tab>"Another way“ meaning what, exactly!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Que l'avez-vous forcé à faire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003080_VAUTHRY<tab>Sin eaters are part of Eulmore's society. But they must be fed with aether─<var 1A 02 /var>living<var 1A 01 /var> aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003080_VAUTHRY<tab>À Eulmore, nous vivons en parfaite harmonie avec les purgateurs. Et ces petits se nourrissent de l'éther contenu dans le corps des êtres vivants, vous savez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003090_VAUTHRY<tab>So─I demanded an offering of flesh! Carved by his own hand, from his own hide!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003090_VAUTHRY<tab>J'ai donc demandé à notre vilain imposteur de faire don de sa personne... en se coupant lui-même un morceau de chair bien juteux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003100_VAUTHRY<tab>And still! <var 1A 02 /var>Still<var 1A 01 /var>, he could not do as I asked!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003100_VAUTHRY<tab>Ce n'est pourtant pas sorcier<var 1D /var>! Mais figurez-vous que ce bon à rien n'est même pas capable de finir le travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003110_VAUTHRY<tab>A wholly unsatisfactory performance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003110_VAUTHRY<tab>Ce n'est pas comme ça que je vais m'amuser, enfin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003120_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis true that Kai-Shirr won his place here by fraud. But his actions were driven only by a desire to share in your paradise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kai-Shirr a peut-être commis une erreur, mais cela ne change rien au fait qu'il a toujours admiré Eulmore du plus profond de son cœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>That you would cast him out I could almost accept, but to humiliate him thus? To demand his very <var 1A 02 /var>life<var 1A 01 /var>!? Is this truly the way of Eulmore!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Comment les habitants de cette ville peuvent-ils supporter de voir un garçon humilié et violenté de la sorte<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003140_VAUTHRY<tab>Oh, you dim, deluded child... Have you ever paused to consider what it takes to maintain such a paradise in this barren, broken world of ours?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003140_VAUTHRY<tab>Pauvre sot... Te rends-tu compte à quel point il est difficile de bâtir un paradis synonyme d'espoir au milieu d'un monde ravagé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003150_VAUTHRY<tab>The guarantee of safety and stability. The knowledge that if one only abides by the rules, one has naught to fear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003150_VAUTHRY<tab>Pour ça, il faut un sentiment de sécurité permanente et un ordre public par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment maintenu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003160_VAUTHRY<tab>I alone can offer these things, for I alone can command the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003160_VAUTHRY<tab>Qui d'autre que <var 1A 02 /var>moi<var 1A 01 /var>, le seul capable de dompter les purgateurs, pourrait offrir pareille garantie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003170_VAUTHRY<tab>And thus am I alone the voice of justice─and any who oppose me villains to be punished!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003170_VAUTHRY<tab>Il n'existe qu'une justice ici-bas, la <var 1A 02 /var>mienne<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>! Quiconque ose me désobéir sera inévitablement jugé, et puni<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003180_ALPHINAUD<tab>And people call this paradise...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu parles d'un paradis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003190_VAUTHRY<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> were granted a place in my city for a particular skill. What was it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003190_VAUTHRY<tab>Mais dis-moi, si tu es ici, c'est parce que tu as un certain talent, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Pourquoi as-tu été embauché<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Painting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Pour peindre des tableaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003210_VAUTHRY<tab>Oho, an artiste! Then you shall paint a picture for me. Of Eulmore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003210_VAUTHRY<tab>Ho ho, un artiste, hein<var 1D /var>? Dans ce cas, je veux que tu peignes quelque chose pour moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003220_VAUTHRY<tab>If I find your art <var 1A 02 /var>pleasing<var 1A 01 /var>, then I may excuse this display of insolence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003220_VAUTHRY<tab>Si le résultat me satisfait, je te pardonnerai ton insolence. Tu n'aimerais pas être obligé de quitter Eulmore, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003230_VAUTHRY<tab>Who gave you permission to tend to that criminal's wounds!? I told you to paint me a picture!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003230_VAUTHRY<tab>Hé, qu'est-ce que tu fais<var 1D /var>!? Je t'ai dit de peindre, alors qu'attends-tu pour t'exécuter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003240_ALPHINAUD<tab>What you need is a mirror, not a painting. It will capture the horror I see before me far better than I ever could.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce n'est pas un tableau qu'il vous faut, mais un miroir<var 1D /var>! Votre seul reflet serait l'ignominie de votre âme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003250_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you walk?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003250_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu peux marcher<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003260_KAISHIRR<tab>I think so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003260_KAISHIRR<tab>Oui, je crrrois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003270_VAUTHRY<tab>Did...did that little worm just insult me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003270_VAUTHRY<tab>Ces... Ces insolents ont fait fi de mes ordres...<var 1D /var>? Fi de <var 1A 02 /var>moi<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003280_VAUTHRY<tab>(TWO LONG SCREAMS)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003280_VAUTHRY<tab>(rugissement hystérique)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003290_VAUTHRY<tab>I─I─I'll kill them! I'll─I'll kill them all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003290_VAUTHRY<tab>Ils me le paieront<var 1D /var>! Ils me le paieront<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003300_VAUTHRY<tab>I'll enslave their minds! I'll─I'll torment them─torture them! Then tear out their hearts!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003300_VAUTHRY<tab>Je ferai d'eux mes pantins, comme tous les autres<var 1D /var>! Je les humilierai<var 1D /var>! Je les torturerai<var 1D /var>! Et je les <var 1A 02 /var>tuerai<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Amh Araeng. From this parched earth the nation of Nabaath Areng once rose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nabaath Areng, dernier havre de répit dans la région asséchée d'Amh Araeng.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When I journeyed here, long ago, I spoke with a sun-weathered elder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Un jour, alors que je faisais halte dans la ville, j'avais été abordé par un vieillard à la peau noircie par le soleil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>He told me Amh Araeng meant “majestic land” in the language of his people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dans notre langue, “Amh” signifie “grandiose”, et “Araeng” peut se traduire par “terre”, m'avait-il dit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And so it might still be...were it not for the Light's unrelenting onslaught...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Qu'évoque le nom de cette région aux rescapés du déluge de Lumière<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>So this is a Mord...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous êtes... un Mord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>That's a kobold!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Un Kobold<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>What beady eyes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ces petits yeux tout ronds...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003350_CASSARD<tab>Master Ghen Gen, this is the friend of the Exarch I was telling you about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003350_CASSARD<tab>Ghen Gen, voici l'ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de l'exarque du Cristal dont je vous ai parlé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003360_GHENGEN<tab>Very good, very good! Though friend or no, all are welcome in Mord Souq.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003360_GHENGEN<tab>Bienvenue à Mord Souq, où rien ne se perd et tout se revend, oui oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003370_CASSARD<tab>"Souq“ is Mordish for ”city.“ As things stand, this souq boasts the largest and busiest marketplace in all Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003370_CASSARD<tab>“Souq” signifie “marché” en langue mord. Comme son nom l'indique, cet endroit est aujourd'hui la plus grande place commerciale d'Amh Araeng.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003380_CASSARD<tab>You'll find ore from the mines here, of course, but all manner of other things too─many of them rare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003380_CASSARD<tab>On y échange toutes sortes de choses, du minerai extrait dans les mines alentour aux bibelots les plus exotiques.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003390_CASSARD<tab>As I told you before, not many visit Amh Araeng by choice, but Mord Souq's a different story. Merchants come from malms around to purchase the relics the Mord dig up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003390_CASSARD<tab>Je vous ai dit que personne ne se rendait en Amh Araeng par choix, mais Mord Souq fait exception<var 1D /var>! On s'y bouscule pour faire de bonnes affaires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003400_GHENGEN<tab>Aye, that they do, for Mord do not dismiss the spoils of the earth. We clean them and polish them and reveal to the world their true value!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003400_GHENGEN<tab>Autre part, on trouve ce qu'on cherche. Mais pour le reste, ça se passe ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003410_GHENGEN<tab>That is why they come here! Come from far away! Come with much money!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003410_GHENGEN<tab>Voilà pourquoi les clients viennent de loiiin loiiin<var 1D /var>! Et les poches pleiiines d'argent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003420_GHENGEN<tab>And so our souq is always busy, busy, busy! No such thing as a thing no one needs!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003420_GHENGEN<tab>Pour nous, rien ne se perd et tout s'achète<var 1D /var>! Mord Souq ne dort jamais, non non non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003430_CASSARD<tab>You say that every time, Master Ghen Gen! Some sort of family motto, wasn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003430_CASSARD<tab>Sacré Ghen Gen, j'ai dû entendre ce slogan un millier de fois<var 1D /var>! Vous l'aimez vraiment, hein<var 1D /var>? Je ne suis pas surpris qu'il se transmette de génération en génération.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003440_CASSARD<tab>Or perhaps a Mord philosophy─for which we should all be very grateful. Would that everyone was so willing to take in refugees regardless of race or creed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003440_CASSARD<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est rassurant de voir un endroit qui accueille les réfugiés sans distinction aucune. Si seulement tout le monde pensait comme les Mords...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003450_CASSARD<tab>Now, then─if you intend to spend any time here, you'll want to gain the trust of the locals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003450_CASSARD<tab>Si vous avez l'intention de rester longtemps en Amh Araeng, je vous conseille de tisser des liens avec les occupants de ce hameau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003460_CASSARD<tab>And there's a little custom all newcomers are expected to observe...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003460_CASSARD<tab>Mais d'abord, vous allez devoir vous plier à un petit rituel local pour prouver que vous êtes digne de confiance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003470_GHENGEN<tab>The cracking of the coinpurse! You buy one thing from the market. Price can be low or high, just as long as you buy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003470_GHENGEN<tab>Le primachat, oui oui<var 1D /var>! Tu dois simplement acheter ton premier article<var 1D /var>! Peu importe son prix, n'importe quoi fera l'affaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003480_CASSARD<tab>...As the good Mord says. In fact, the Exarch sent a little something to cover this very expense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003480_CASSARD<tab>Voilà, vous savez tout. Vous avez de la chance, l'exarque du Cristal m'a remis un petit pécule pour que vous puissiez faire vos emplettes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003490_CASSARD<tab>A Voeburt gold piece, no less! The first I've held in years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003490_CASSARD<tab>Des pièces du royaume de Voeburt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003500_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Voeburt gold!? <var 1A 02 /var>Real<var 1A 01 /var> Voeburt gold!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003500_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Vrai vrai<var 1D /var>!? Je veux voir ça de mes propres yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003510_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Here, newcomer! Crack your coinpurse with me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003510_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Chez moi<var 1D /var>! Viens faire ton primachat chez moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003520_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>No, no, you want my goods, newcomer! I have jars and pots, all smooth and shiny!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003520_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>Non, chez moi<var 1D /var>! Je te ferai un prix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003530_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Over here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003530_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Par ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003540_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Come and look!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003540_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Allez, tu le regretteras pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003550_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>You buy! You buy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003550_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>J'ai tout ce qu'il te faut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003560_GHENGEN<tab>Enough of that! Calm, I say!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003560_GHENGEN<tab>Calmez-vous, voyons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003570_GHENGEN<tab>This one must still journey through the barrens. Nothing bulky! Nothing heavy! No <var 1A 02 /var>pots<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003570_GHENGEN<tab><var 08 E905 ((Cette humaine)) ((Cet humain)) /var> a encore de nombreux voyages qui l'attendent, et <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> ne peut cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pas s'encombrer de bricoles inutiles, non non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003580_GHENGEN<tab>Nothing better for the road than a full belly. Spend that piece at Rhon Ron's place, yes? Eat for three before you leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003580_GHENGEN<tab>Ne fais pas attention à eux. Tiens, que dirais-tu d'aller manger un morceau chez Rhon Ron<var 1D /var>? Je te le recommande personnellement, oui oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003590_ALISAIE<tab>(-???-)Get back here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003590_ALISAIE<tab>(-Voix familière-)Tu ne m'échapperas pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Is that!? It can't be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Non, je rêve<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003610_ALISAIE<tab>Hah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003610_ALISAIE<tab>(porte un coup d'épée qui terrasse le monstre)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Impressive!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sionnant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You almost lost that one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il était à deux doigts de s'échapper...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003620_ALISAIE<tab>Just a lesser sin eater. Nothing to write home about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003620_ALISAIE<tab>Ce n'était qu'un petit purgateur de rien du tout...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003630_ALISAIE<tab>I had it under control! ...Right up until the moment I didn't. I'll do better next time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003630_ALISAIE<tab>J'ai été prise par surprise<var 1D /var>! La prochaine fois, ça ne se passera pas comme ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003640_ALISAIE<tab>I knew you'd turn up sooner or later, but I had been hoping for <var 1A 02 /var>sooner<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003640_ALISAIE<tab>Je me doutais que vous... que <var 1A 02 /var>tu<var 1A 01 /var> viendrais. Mais tu en as mis, du temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003650_ALISAIE<tab>How are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003650_ALISAIE<tab>Alors, comment vas-tu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003660_ALISAIE<tab>We've fought them to a standstill, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003660_ALISAIE<tab>Alors comme ça, le conflit avec Garlemald est toujours au point mort...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003670_ALISAIE<tab>The Exarch did say that the Empire seemed to have drawn back when he last looked in on the Source. But without knowing for sure how fast time was passing there, I couldn't help worrying that a lot might have happened since then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003670_ALISAIE<tab>L'exarque du Cristal m'a dit que la situation était stable lors de sa dernière liaison avec le monde primitif, mais à cause des divergences temporelles, j'étais toujours inquiète...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003680_ALISAIE<tab>I'm heartily relieved to hear that it hasn't─just as Alphinaud must have been. As you can imagine, both he and Urianger were desperate to hear the news from home when I arrived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003680_ALISAIE<tab>En ce qui concerne Alphinaud et Urianger, j'en ai profité pour leur dire tout ce que j'avais appris lors de nos retrouvailles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003690_ALISAIE<tab>I haven't actually seen Thancred and Y'shtola yet, but they will have heard all the latest developments from the Exarch by now─or should have, at least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003690_ALISAIE<tab>Je n'ai pas encore eu l'occasion de croiser Thancred et Y'shtola, mais je ne doute pas que l'exarque leur a aussi déjà tout raconté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003700_ALISAIE<tab>When I think of how frantic Tataru and the others must be, I want nothing more than to rush back and reassure them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003700_ALISAIE<tab>Quand je pense à Tataru qui doit être en train de se faire un sang d'encre, je n'ai qu'une envie, c'est de retourner chez nous le plus vite possible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003710_ALISAIE<tab>But we still haven't found a way to reverse the summoning. And even if we had, we couldn't just ignore Urianger's vision.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003710_ALISAIE<tab>Enfin, je dis ça mais on ne sait pas comment faire le voyage dans le sens inverse. Et puis, on ne peut pas ignorer la vision funeste d'Urianger...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>He may use ten words where one would suffice─and they may often obscure as much as they reveal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>À propos d'Urianger, tu ne trouves pas qu'il parle toujours de façon cryptique<var 1D /var>? Et encore, les rares fois où il se décide à échanger avec nous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003730_ALISAIE<tab>But on this matter, he was as clear as day. I do not doubt for one moment that he saw what he claims.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003730_ALISAIE<tab>J'aimerais qu'il ait davantage l'esprit d'équipe... Mais bon, il ne ferait pas exprès de nous induire en erreur. Je sais que dans le fond, il tient trop à nous pour ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003740_ALISAIE<tab>Nor how difficult it must have been to speak about them. The Eighth Umbral Calamity and your death aren't exactly topics for idle conversation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003740_ALISAIE<tab>Dans cette vision qu'il a eue, il se passe des choses terribles. Le huitième fléau, ta mort... Je suis sûre qu'il a beaucoup hésité avant de se confier à nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003750_ALISAIE<tab>As much as I might want to go home, I don't want to go home to that. We can't allow the Rejoining to happen, which means we have to save the First from the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003750_ALISAIE<tab>C'est pour ça que j'ai décidé de le croire. Nous devons nous battre pour empêcher la réunification du premier reflet avec notre monde, et ça passe par l'éradication des purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003760_ALISAIE<tab>That great wall of white is a remnant of the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003760_ALISAIE<tab>Tu vois cet immense mur blanc<var 1D /var>? C'est un vestige du déluge de Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003770_ALISAIE<tab>A hundred years ago, the balance in the First tipped decisively in favor of Light. From that moment, it rose and swelled with each passing day─and then, without warning, it burst forth like water from a broken dam.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003770_ALISAIE<tab>Il y a un siècle, le pouvoir de la Lumière s'est intensifié de façon exponentielle, jusqu'à atteindre le point de non-retour. La clarté a alors déferlé sur le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003780_ALISAIE<tab>...A colossal wave of pure Light, drowning everything in its wake. Only Norvrandt was spared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003780_ALISAIE<tab>Cette vague de Lumière a englouti quatre-vingt-dix pour cent de la planète, n'épargnant de la destruction que le seul continent de Norvrandt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003790_ALISAIE<tab>For the most part, living things are composed of aether of various different aspects.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003790_ALISAIE<tab>Comme tu le sais sûrement, dans la majorité des cas, le corps des êtres vivants est fait d'éther, lui-même composé de plusieurs éléments.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003800_ALISAIE<tab>But when exposed to such a flood, their aetheric harmony is shattered, and their natural form breaks down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003800_ALISAIE<tab>Le déluge de Lumière a eu pour effet de rompre l'équilibre élémentaire existant, et les créatures affectées n'ont plus été en mesure de conserver leur aspect.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003810_ALISAIE<tab>Then they either perish...or are warped into mindless abominations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003810_ALISAIE<tab>Certaines ont disparu purement et simplement... alors que d'autres se sont transformées en monstres difformes, dépourvus de toute raison.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, that's how the sin eaters came to be. They were once living creatures─or people─that were caught in the path of the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Oui, ces purgateurs qui submergent le premier reflet... Avant de devenir ce qu'ils sont, ils étaient tous un animal... ou même une personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003830_ALISAIE<tab>Once the change is wrought, there is no going back. In that instant, they are gripped by an insatiable appetite for aether, and will happily gorge themselves on any living thing within reach.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003830_ALISAIE<tab>Les purgateurs ne retrouveront jamais leur apparence d'origine. Ils sont condamnés à errer en quête de proies pour satisfaire leur soif d'éther...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003840_ALISAIE<tab>But even that is not the worst of it. The stronger sin eaters can plant Light in us like seeds in soil, corrupting our aether, and triggering the birth of new monstrosities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003840_ALISAIE<tab>Les plus puissants spécimens sont même capables d'agir sur le flux éthéré de leurs victimes pour les transformer en purgateurs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003850_ALISAIE<tab>They are creatures of base instinct that exist only to feed and to multiply. They feel no pity, know no remorse, and are utterly deaf to reason. Which is why they must be destroyed. Every last one of them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003850_ALISAIE<tab>Le but de ces créatures est simple<var 1D /var>: se nourrir et se multiplier. Puisque la cohabitation avec les humains est impossible, notre seule solution est de les exterminer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003860_ALISAIE<tab>The infirmary is full of the sin eaters' victims, left here to spend their final hours waiting for the change to overtake them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003860_ALISAIE<tab>Les malheureux qui ont été touchés par la Lumière des purgateurs viennent à l'auberge du Grand Départ, pour une lente agonie qui les transformera à leur tour en monstres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003870_ALISAIE<tab>Look, over there─where the wall is broken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003870_ALISAIE<tab>Regarde, là-bas. Il y a une fissure dans le cristal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003880_ALISAIE<tab>Do you see what lies beyond?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003880_ALISAIE<tab>Tu vois cette immense plaine blanche, de l'autre côté<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>That's what the land became after the Light flooded in. An empty white nothingness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>C'est une région qui a été dévastée par le déluge de Lumière. Il ne reste plus rien, juste une immense terre vide et sans vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>Life cannot exist in such conditions. The primordial Light would wreak havoc on the body's aetheric balance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>La puissance de la Lumière y est si intense que tout humain qui s'y aventurerait verrait l'équilibre de son éther rompu en un instant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>That nectarine you bought...it's Halric's favorite fruit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>La nectarine que j'ai achetée, tout à l'heure... C'est le fruit préféré de Halric, le pauvre garçon qui est sur le point de se transformer en purgateur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Most of the patients, Halric included, survived the attacks of powerful eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Comme lui, de nombreuses victimes de ces monstres tentent de survivre le plus longtemps possible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003930_ALISAIE<tab>But their fate was sealed all the same. The monsters' corruption has entered their bodies, and their very essence is being subsumed by Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003930_ALISAIE<tab>Mais elles sont déjà condamnées. La Lumière s'insinue peu à peu dans leur chair en consumant leur énergie éthérée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003940_ALISAIE<tab>The twisted state of the world itself just makes matters worse. Under normal circumstances, a person's aether naturally tends to equilibrium, but for these poor souls, the opposite is true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003940_ALISAIE<tab>Bien sûr, l'environnement n'arrange rien. Le surplus de Lumière dans la région ne fait qu'accélérer le processus de transformation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003950_ALISAIE<tab>Sooner or later, every single one of them will turn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003950_ALISAIE<tab>Ils n'ont aucun espoir... Ces miséreux finiront tous par devenir des purgateurs, tôt ou tard...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen and the patients, they all know this. They know what has to be done before the change goes too far─before the eater within takes over.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen et les autres soignants en ont bien conscience, et ils savent qu'ils doivent mettre fin à leur agonie avant que la métamorphose finale ne s'opère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003970_ALISAIE<tab>The preferred method is mixing poison into their favorite food. In my time here, I've borne witness to a lot of last meals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003970_ALISAIE<tab>Dans ses derniers moments, ils offrent au patient son aliment favori, en y ajoutant un peu de poison... Je ne compte plus le nombre de fois où j'ai assisté à cette scène déchirante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003980_ALISAIE<tab>I feel just as helpless as before. No matter how hard I fight, it's never enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003980_ALISAIE<tab>C'est tellement rageant<var 1D /var>! J'ai beau combattre encore et encore, devenir de plus en plus forte, ce n'est jamais assez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003990_ALISAIE<tab>But it's a war I mean to wage, nonetheless. ...Speaking of wars, do you remember how I made you promise not to leave me, and then promptly collapsed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003990_ALISAIE<tab>Je sais, il faut positiver. Tu te souviens, quand je t'avais défendu de m'abandonner<var 1D /var>? Finalement, c'est moi qui t'ai fait faux bond...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004000_ALISAIE<tab>Well, let's just say I had a few choice words for the Exarch concerning the timing of his summons...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004000_ALISAIE<tab>J'en ai tant voulu à l'exarque du Cristal de m'invoquer à un moment pareil<var 1D /var>! En arrivant ici, je lui ai bien fait comprendre ma façon de penser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004010_ALISAIE<tab>But even if the fault lay with someone else, I couldn't shake the feeling that I'd abandoned you on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004010_ALISAIE<tab>Pendant que je passais mon temps à me plaindre, tu étais sur le champ de bataille, <var 08 E905 ((seule)) ((seul)) /var> face à notre ennemi. Et je m'en veux toujours ter<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004020_ALISAIE<tab>So I swore that I'd make up for my absence there by making a difference here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004020_ALISAIE<tab>Mais plutôt que de me lamenter, j'ai fermement décidé de faire tout ce qui était en mon pouvoir pour soutenir notre cause, quel que soit le prix à payer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004030_ALISAIE<tab>And that's what keeps me moving forward...even when things seem hopeless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004030_ALISAIE<tab>C'est ça qui me donne la force d'avancer aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004040_ALISAIE<tab>On which note, it's time we headed back. The longer we keep Tesleen waiting, the harder this will be for her...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004040_ALISAIE<tab>On rentre<var 1D /var>? Je préfère ne pas faire attendre Tesleen plus longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004050_TESLEEN<tab>Speak up if you'd like another helping. I made a little bit more than usual today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004050_TESLEEN<tab>J'en ai préparé plus qu'à l'accoutumée, donc n'hésitez pas à me dire si vous en voulez davantage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004060_ALISAIE<tab>And you've added something special to the broth, if I'm not mistaken?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004060_ALISAIE<tab>C'est moi, ou la garniture aussi est plus riche que d'habitude<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004070_TESLEEN<tab>Aye, well, it's not often we have visitors from the Crystarium, so I may have thrown in a few extra bits and bobs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004070_TESLEEN<tab>Tu as l'œil<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas tous les jours qu'on a un visiteur de Cristarium, donc j'ai fait un petit effort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You needn't have gone to the trouble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il ne fallait pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll have another bowl, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Double ration pour moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004080_TESLEEN<tab>Oh, it's nothing, really! And we do so rarely have guests.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004080_TESLEEN<tab>Ne vous en faites pas, voyons. Tout le plaisir est pour moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004090_TESLEEN<tab>That's what I like to hear! Give me a moment to warm up the pot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004090_TESLEEN<tab>Voilà ce que je voulais entendre<var 1D /var>! Encore un peu de patience, le reste est en train de bouillir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004100_TESLEEN<tab>In a place like this, you learn to take what moments of happiness you can get.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004100_TESLEEN<tab>Votre visite égaye un peu mon quotidien. Vous aurez compris que nous avons rarement l'occasion de sourire, en Amh Araeng...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004110_TESLEEN<tab>I remember when I first came here with my mother. She was showing the early signs...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004110_TESLEEN<tab>J'ai emmené ma mère ici, lorsqu'elle a été blessée par un purgateur. Depuis, je n'ai plus quitté cet endroit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004120_TESLEEN<tab>I knew there was no way to save her, but I just couldn't face what needed to be done. That's the way of it for most people─why they travel for malms to stay here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004120_TESLEEN<tab>Les gens savent qu'il n'existe pas de remède, mais ils n'ont pas le courage de mettre un terme à l'existence de ceux qu'ils aiment. Alors, ils s'en remettent à nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004130_TESLEEN<tab>Beaten, broken souls come to wait out the inevitable. To receive the mercy of a painless death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004130_TESLEEN<tab>Il n'y a aucun espoir, ici... Tout ce que nous avons à leur offrir, c'est un peu de répit, et de la dignité dans la mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004140_TESLEEN<tab>When my mother finally left this world, I was mad with grief, but also thankful that her passing was a peaceful one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004140_TESLEEN<tab>J'ai beaucoup pleuré lors du décès de ma mère, mais j'étais soulagée de la voir partir avec un sourire sur le visage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004150_TESLEEN<tab>It's never easy, ending a life you've cared for. Even when you believe they go on to a better place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004150_TESLEEN<tab>Je sais ce que vous pensez... Est-ce juste d'ôter la vie à ces gens tout en espérant que ce monde soit un jour sauvé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004160_TESLEEN<tab>I often find myself wishing the Warrior of Darkness would come and do that part for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004160_TESLEEN<tab>C'est peut-être égoïste, mais je me dis à chaque fois que c'est le Guerrier des Ténèbres qui devrait s'acquitter de cette tâche ingrate...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004170_ALISAIE<tab>The Warrior of Darkness...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004170_ALISAIE<tab>Le Guerrier des Ténèbres<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004180_TESLEEN<tab>You've never heard the tale? I'm not sure where it began, but every child in Norvrandt could tell you a version of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004180_TESLEEN<tab>Tu n'en as jamais entendu parler<var 1D /var>? Je n'en connais pas l'origine, mais c'est une histoire connue de tous, ici.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004190_TESLEEN<tab>"Warrior of Darkness, servant of death,
take care of our souls at our dying breath...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004190_TESLEEN<tab>On dit que le Guerrier des Ténèbres est un messager de la mort qui descend sur terre pour faucher les vies et les renvoyer à la sombre mer céleste.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004200_TESLEEN<tab>“Let sinners and eaters of sin go with thee,
That all may return to the sunless sea.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004200_TESLEEN<tab>Humains comme purgateurs, personne ne pourrait échapper à son courroux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004210_TESLEEN<tab>...Well, that's the version I was taught anyway. It's just an old bedtime story─he's certainly never deigned to visit us here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004210_TESLEEN<tab>Bien sûr, cela relève plus du mythe que de la réalité. De toute façon, si quelqu'un avait déjà croisé sa route, il ne serait plus ici pour en parler...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004220_ALISAIE<tab>Which is a good thing, surely? He sounds rather ominous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004220_ALISAIE<tab>Quelle légende sinistre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004230_TESLEEN<tab>Do you think so? I always liked the idea that he treated every soul the same, even the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004230_TESLEEN<tab>Tu trouves<var 1D /var>? Moi, j'aime bien le fait qu'une personne soit là pour apporter la mort à la fois aux humains et aux purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004240_JOURNEYSHEADPATIENT<tab>They're coming...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004240_JOURNEYSHEADPATIENT<tab>Il arrive...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004250_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Tesleen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004250_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Tesleen, c'est terrible<var 1D /var>! Halric a disparu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004260_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Have you seen Halric!? I swear, I only took my eyes off him for a moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004260_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Je l'ai laissé sans sur<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>ce l'espace d'un instant, et quand je suis revenue, il était plus là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004270_ALISAIE<tab>Any sign of him!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004270_ALISAIE<tab>Tu as trouvé quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004280_ALISAIE<tab>No luck, then. But he surely can't have gone far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004280_ALISAIE<tab>Le purgateur que tu as vu ne me dit rien de bon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004290_ALISAIE<tab>We should keep looking. The sin eaters are out in force, and if we don't find him soon, you can be sure they will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004290_ALISAIE<tab>Halric n'est sûrement pas allé bien loin... Continuons à chercher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004300_ALISAIE<tab>Did you see the size of that thing? It must be one of the nasty ones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004300_ALISAIE<tab>Il est énorme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Wherever it's going, it can only mean trouble. After it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Suivons-le, il nous mènera peut-être à Halric<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004320_ALISAIE<tab>There it is!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004320_ALISAIE<tab>Le voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004330_ALISAIE<tab>Is that─ Oh...oh no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004330_ALISAIE<tab>C'est... Oh non...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004340_ALISAIE<tab>Halric!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004340_ALISAIE<tab>Halric<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004350_TESLEEN<tab>We have to run!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004350_TESLEEN<tab>Viens, vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004360_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen, no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004360_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004370_TESLEEN<tab>We all deserve happiness...wherever we can find it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004370_TESLEEN<tab>Tu sais, tout le monde a son rôle à jouer dans ce monde...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004380_TESLEEN<tab>The time left to you...is precious... No one should die...in pain...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004380_TESLEEN<tab>Tu dois être fort pour ceux que tu aimes, jusqu'au bout...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004390_TESLEEN<tab>Mother...Mother, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004390_TESLEEN<tab>Merci pour tout, maman...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004400_TESLEEN<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004400_TESLEEN<tab>ア、ア、アァッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004410_TESLEEN<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004410_TESLEEN<tab>アアアアアッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004411_TESLEEN<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004411_TESLEEN<tab>ガガッグッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Oh no, no... No, no, no, no, no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Non, Tesleen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004430_TESLEEN<tab>Forgive me...Alisaie...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004430_TESLEEN<tab>Pardonne-moi, Alisaie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so you return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je suis content de vous revoir tous les trois sains et saufs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Have you gained a better understanding of the crisis now faced by the First?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Avez-vous une idée plus précise de la situation dans le premier reflet<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004460_ALISAIE<tab>"Better“ is not the word I would use.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004460_ALISAIE<tab>Oui, je comprends mieux, maintenant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004470_ALISAIE<tab>Some lands may have been spared the Flood, but the survivors live only to suffer. There seems no end to the horrors inflicted by the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004470_ALISAIE<tab>Les occupants des rares régions épargnées par le déluge de Lumière vivent chaque jour dans la peur d'être attaqués par les purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed. Those abominations are a calamity in their own right. And I can well imagine how hopeless the task of eradicating them must seem to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Oui... Ces créatures sont de véritables bourreaux auxquels le commun des mortels semble n'avoir aucune chance d'échapper.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But after countless battles and untold sacrifice, we have identified a potential weakness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mais tout espoir n'est pas encore perdu. Les innombrables victimes des purgateurs nous ont permis de comprendre quelque chose d'important.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sin eaters are drawn to serve the strongest of their kind─a class of creature we call “Lightwardens.” And from what we have been able to ascertain, only a handful of these entities exist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Un peu comme les fourmis avec leur reine, la majorité de la meute répond à un cercle très restreint de spécimens redoutables que nous appelons grands purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Just as an ant colony will perish in the absence of its queen, we believe that the death of a Lightwarden will cause the lesser creatures within its sphere of influence to disperse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Si nous arrivions à terrasser un de ces monstres, nul doute que les attaques de ses sbires dans sa région d'influence se feraient moins fréquentes et virulentes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have a feeling Eulmore might have something to say about any concerted action we take against these monsters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'en penserait-on, à Eulmore<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vauthry's command over the sin eaters is integral to Eulmoran society. In seeming to guarantee his people's safety, it guarantees their obedience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si Vauthry a réussi à imposer son règne incontesté dans cette cité, c'est grâce à sa faculté de manipuler les purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004540_ALPHINAUD<tab>He will not take kindly to us depriving him of such useful allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004540_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai du mal à imaginer qu'il ferme les yeux sur le fait que nous cherchons à éliminer la source de son pouvoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Agreed. Thus we will need to occupy or otherwise divert his forces whilst we proceed with the business of eliminating the Wardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tout juste. C'est pourquoi nous devons faire en sorte de chasser progressivement les purgateurs, tout en nous méfiant d'Eulmore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Until we have done so, all other considerations must be set aside if we are to forestall the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>C'est présentement mon seul espoir de sauver ce monde... et peut-être votre unique chance d'éviter une catastrophe dans le vôtre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you sure that eliminating the Wardens will be enough?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Cela empêchera-t-il vraiment un nouveau fléau<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm not sure I follow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai un peu de mal à voir le rapport...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your uncertainty is understandable, given the circumstances. Perhaps a more detailed explanation is in order. To begin at the beginning, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Laisse-moi t'expliquer en quoi consisterait exactement la réunification du premier reflet et du monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the ancient past, a single star was divided into fourteen worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En des temps très anciens, le monde s'est divisé en quatorze entités distinctes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This is the Source─your home. These others are the thirteen shards, in whose number we find the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le monde primitif, d'où vous venez, et treize reflets, dont fait partie le monde où nous nous trouvons ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though physically separate, they retain a connection to each other, and with the Source especially.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ces mondes, bien que distincts, ont un lien spécial. Le monde primitif, en particulier, tient un rôle central dans leur relation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now, let us assume that a given element in one of the shards attains abnormal ascendancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Prenez un de ces reflets. Imaginez que pour une quelconque raison, l'énergie éthérée d'un certain élément atteigne un niveau anormalement élevé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Just as water will flow from the highest point to the lowest, the excess energy will begin trickling into the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Un peu comme un liquide qui déborde d'un verre trop plein, cette énergie élémentaire s'écoule... dans le monde primitif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And such an influx of aether will of course exert a palpable influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bien sûr, cela n'est pas sans conséquence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If the element in question were fire, then drought and wild fires might ensue. If it were ice, one might expect the weather to turn bitterly cold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Selon l'élément concerné, les répercussions peuvent prendre différentes formes. Des incendies ou de la sécheresse pour l'élément feu, une vague de froid pour l'élément glace...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As aether continues to pour in, such phenomena will become more and more extreme, until eventually, a single untimely event triggers a disaster which “cracks” the barrier dividing the two worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En s'aggravant, ces phénomènes peuvent devenir des catastrophes de grande ampleur... et provoquer une fissure dans le “mur” qui sépare les mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>What was once a trickle now becomes a deluge, sweeping the shard along to be rejoined with the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>L'énergie élémentaire se déverse alors à torrents dans le monde primitif, entraînant la réunification des deux mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At the same time, the element which held sway in the shard is unleashed in full, its energies amplifying the original disaster to truly catastrophic proportions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Et c'est à ce moment que le surplus d'énergie provoque un désastre sans précédent dans le monde primitif, ce que vous appelez “fléau”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>An earthquake thus magnified might strike with enough force to shatter continents; a tidal wave might swell to a size capable of drowning entire nations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Cela peut être un séisme déchirant l'écorce terrestre pour l'élément terre, un raz-de-marée à même d'engloutir un continent pour l'élément eau...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>These devastating events are what we refer to as “Umbral Calamities.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Telle est la véritable origine des cataclysmes qui ont ravagé votre planète à de multiples reprises.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Seven times has a calamity befallen the Source; seven times has a shard been absorbed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sept fléaux ont déjà eu lieu dans le monde primitif, ce qui signifie qu'autant de reflets ont déjà disparu dans le processus de réunification.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At present, the Light-drowned realm of the First stands perilously close to meeting the conditions for a Rejoining.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À l'heure actuelle, la con<var 16 /var>cen<var 16 /var>tra<var 16 /var>tion de Lumière est si élevée dans le premier reflet que l'heure de la réunification n'est sûrement plus très loin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It is the sin eaters who are to blame for the Light's continued dominance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'en reviens aux purgateurs, qui sont donc une des causes de ce déséquilibre élémentaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In addition to attracting their lesser kin, the Lightwardens I mentioned earlier radiate aether, saturating every corner of their territory with Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Les grands purgateurs, dont je vous ai parlé plus tôt, ont chacun un territoire qu'ils inondent de leur intense clarté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Even here in the Flood-spared region of Norvrandt, their influence is strong enough to banish night from the sky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>C'est la raison pour laquelle la nuit a disparu en Norvrandt, continent qui avait pourtant été épargné par le déluge de Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thus, if we are to restore balance to the First and head off a potential calamity, it is imperative that we put each and every Lightwarden to the sword.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu comprends, maintenant, pourquoi les éliminer est si important<var 1D /var>? Cela rétablirait l'équilibre élémentaire, et empêcherait la réunification de nos mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004760_ALISAIE<tab>We've been doing our best to take the fight to the enemy ever since we first heard the Exarch's explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004760_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud et moi, nous avons déjà entendu ces ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions. Et nous avons tenté de faire avancer les choses, chacun de notre côté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though we have yet to claim any meaningful victories, if truth be told.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, nous n'avons obtenu aucun résultat concret pour le moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Apart from being confoundingly elusive, the Lightwardens possess a troublesome quality which compelled us to delay our plans until such time as you arrived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004780_ALPHINAUD<tab>D'une part les grands purgateurs ne se montrent pas facilement, et d'autre part un détail nous a contraints à attendre votre arrivée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004790_LYNA<tab>Forgive the interruption, my lord, but Holminster Switch is requesting reinforcements!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004790_LYNA<tab>Exarque<var 1D /var>! Pardonnez-moi de vous interrompre, c'est urgent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004800_LYNA<tab>They say the sin eaters are attacking in force, and the village could soon be overrun.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004800_LYNA<tab>On nous rapporte une attaque massive de purgateurs à Holminster. Ils seraient assez nombreux pour détruire le village tout entier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alert the guard. We should be prepared in case the fighting reaches the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ils pourraient se diriger vers Cristarium par la suite... Fais en sorte que chaque entrée soit suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment gardée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You have command of our forces in the field, Captain, but hold off on entering the town until I arrive. That goes for Alphinaud and Alisaie as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Une fois sur place, tu prendras le commandement en charge. Juste une chose, dis bien à Alisaie et Alphinaud de m'attendre pour engager le combat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004830_LYNA<tab>My lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004830_LYNA<tab>Compris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pray, lend us your strength. Such a fight will provide you with far greater insight than any explanation I could offer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nous allons avoir besoin de ton aide. Le combat qui t'attend là-bas t'en apprendra bien plus que de longues ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004850_LYNA<tab>It's releasing its aether. Fall back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004850_LYNA<tab>Le grand purgateur a commencé à déverser sa Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004860_LYNA<tab>We cannot let it touch us. Quickly, my lord, we must withdraw!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004860_LYNA<tab>Nous ne pouvons pas risquer d'y être exposés. Exarque, il faut partir d'ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That will not be necessary, Captain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Non, c'est inutile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Though I appreciate your concern. The eternal Light of these creatures has confounded us for nigh on a hundred years. For each we have put down, another has risen up in its place, born of the selfsame aether relinquished by its predecessor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Lorsqu'un grand purgateur est vaincu, il laisse échapper la Lumière qu'il contenait pour créer son successeur. Un mécanisme de perpétuation redoutable...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But now we have a way to contain that corruption.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Voilà maintenant un siècle que l'humanité est impuissante face à ces êtres. Mais désormais, nous avons un nouvel atout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The blessing of Light! And the hero who wields it now stands before you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le pouvoir de la “bénédiction de la Lumière” peut les vaincre pour toujours. Et son détenteur est parmi nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The blessing of Light! And the hero who wields it now stands before you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le pouvoir de la “bénédiction de la Lumière” peut les vaincre pour toujours. Et sa détentrice est parmi nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Behold! The monster's power is broken! And the world twisted by its touch returns to its rightful form!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À partir d'aujourd'hui, nous repoussons la Lumière pour redonner à notre monde son vrai visage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004930_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>The sky!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004930_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>... Le ciel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004940_CRYSTARIUMWOMAN<tab>It can't be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004940_CRYSTARIUMWOMAN<tab>Incroyable...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004950_CRYSTARIUMOLDMAN<tab>What's happening...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004950_CRYSTARIUMOLDMAN<tab>Qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004960_CRYSTARIUMGIRL<tab>It's so beautiful...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004960_CRYSTARIUMGIRL<tab>Magnifique...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004970_MOREN<tab>The sunless sea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004970_MOREN<tab>La sombre mer céleste...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004980_MOREN<tab>The Warrior of Darkness has come!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004980_MOREN<tab>Les légendes disaient vrai... Le Guerrier des Ténèbres est enfin apparu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004990_LYNA<tab>Is that...what I think it is?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004990_LYNA<tab>C'est si beau... Je n'en crois pas mes yeux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005000_ALPHINAUD<tab>The night sky, as it should be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005000_ALPHINAUD<tab>La nuit est de retour... La nuit telle que nous la connaissons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005010_LYNA<tab>Who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005010_LYNA<tab>Qui êtes-vous pour réaliser un tel miracle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005020_LYNA<tab>You killed a Warden, then bathed in its aether as if it were a spring shower, and now the sky...? The legends are true!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005020_LYNA<tab>Vous... Vous avez terrassé ce grand purgateur, et absorbé sans sourciller la Lumière qui s'en est échappée<var 1D /var>! Et ce ciel... C'est exactement comme dans la légende<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005030_LYNA<tab>My lord...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005030_LYNA<tab>Exarque...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>How many years have I waited for this moment...
