target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Héroïne)) ((Héros)) /var> d'un autre monde, nous avons attendu ta venue pendant tant d'années.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For the one possessed of Her blessing. For you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Toi, qui grâce à la bénédiction de la Lumière, as le pouvoir d'anéantir nos terribles ennemis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You have vanquished the Lightwarden of Lakeland, and for the first time in a century darkness has returned to the mantle of night.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ta victoire sur le grand purgateur de Grand-Lac a permis aux Ténèbres de revenir dans la région et à la nuit de tomber pour la première fois depuis une éternité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Without the ever-present Light to sustain them, the sin eaters will have no choice but to retreat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Leur meneur défait et la Lumière chassée, nul doute que les purgateurs restants n'auront d'autre choix que de trouver refuge dans les territoires voisins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Yet our victory is far from complete.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Car oui, l'équilibre n'a été rétabli qu'à Grand-Lac, et les autres régions sont toujours sous l'emprise de ces puissantes créatures.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though darkness has fallen here, the other Wardens yet bask beneath burning skies, feasting upon what little life remains.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nous avons gagné une bataille, mais pas la guerre. À travers Norvrandt, des hommes et des femmes continuent de souffrir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Even should it cost me all I have, I would see each and every one of them slain, that this world might be spared from oblivion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Entends-tu leur appel à l'aide<var 1D /var>? Je refuse de les abandonner. Je refuse d'abandonner le premier reflet au funeste destin auquel il est condamné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Not only for the First, but for the Source as well! Save one and we save the other! But...be that as it may...I concede it was wrong of me to summon you to this fight against your will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Même si l'avenir de ton monde est lié à celui du mien, j'ai conscience d'avoir été égoïste en vous invoquant ici sans vous demander votre avis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I swear on my life, I will one day atone for that deed. But for the present...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je te promets de te rendre service à mon tour, lorsque le moment viendra. Mais pour l'heure, je t'en prie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I beg you stay and see this fight to its conclusion. Cast down the Wardens, and restore Darkness to the First!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Prête-moi ta force... Prête-moi ton pouvoir, pour vaincre les purgateurs et ramener les Ténèbres sur ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will become the Warrior you need.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je serai votre <var 08 E905 ((Guerrière)) ((Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It sounds like a glorious adventure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Voilà un combat qui s'annonce passionnant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It seems I've no choice but to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je suppose que je n'ai pas le choix...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On behalf of the First, I offer you my deepest thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci... Merci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005150_ALISAIE<tab>I understand there is much at stake here, Exarch, but why do you risk yourself so readily? It must have been a dangerous drain on your aether to summon even one person across the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005150_ALISAIE<tab>Pourquoi tenez-vous tant à participer à la lutte<var 1D /var>? Vous avez déjà tant payé de votre personne pour nous faire venir dans le premier reflet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I do it for my people, of course─to give the Crystarium the tomorrow it deserves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pour les habitants de Cristarium, pour tous ceux qui ont décidé de croire en moi... Je veux me battre et leur offrir une vie de paix et de sérénité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005170_ALISAIE<tab>That is true <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>, yes─but the city had yet to be built when you first called forth the Crystal Tower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005170_ALISAIE<tab>Je comprends, mais... Avant que vous ne fassiez venir la Tour de Cristal ici, il n'y avait rien, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005180_ALISAIE<tab>I'm simply curious to know what prompted you to commit yourself so completely to this particular course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005180_ALISAIE<tab>Qu'est-ce qui vous a poussé à agir ainsi, au départ<var 1D /var>? Il y a une raison par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re qui vous a motivé à ce point<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>There are...things which we can ill afford to lose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>... Il y a une personne que je veux sauver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And...I sensed from the first that I had a part to play in preserving them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Si, pour lui offrir un avenir digne de ce nom, je dois sauver ce monde tout entier, alors je suis prêt à le faire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Forgive me. I fear the events of the day may have taken their toll.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Cela vous surprend<var 1D /var>? Je préfère ne pas vous en dire plus pour le moment, si vous le permettez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Despite appearances, I am an old man─one burdened with many...difficult memories, some too painful to recall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je sais que je n'en ai pas l'air, mais je suis très vieux. Quand vous aurez mon âge, vous comprendrez sûrement à quel point il est difficile de parler de soi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005230_ALISAIE<tab>Well, then I'm sorry for pressing you. It's a family failing, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005230_ALISAIE<tab>Désolée, je ne voulais pas vous contrarier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hmph. One which has served us well, more often than not. Needless to say, we will continue to fight at your side until the last sin eater is defeated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien sûr, ma sœur et moi allons continuer à combattre à vos côtés. Pour tous nos amis du monde primitif, nous vaincrons les purgateurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Come then, my Warriors of Darkness─let us gather the surviving villagers, and make our way back to the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Rentrons à Cristarium. Ces pauvres villageois ont bien besoin de repos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So it's your lot's turn to be the Warriors of Darkness, is it? It's funny how things work out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ça y est<var 1D /var>? C'est vous maintenant les Guerriers des Ténèbres<var 1D /var>? Quelle ironie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Been watching, have you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu es encore là...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A16_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>These are my “private” quarters...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A16_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pas dans ma chambre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well, I did warn you. I followed you to Eulmore and then on to Amh Araeng. And I was there when you slew the Lightwarden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je t'avais pourtant prévenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Je t'ai observé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Et je n'ai pas raté une miette de ta victoire sur le grand purgateur, évidemment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aye, I know. Just the place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Bah quoi<var 1D /var>? Il n'y a pas d'endroit plus tranquille pour parler, que je sache.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>In case you've forgotten, you're the only one who can see me. If we had one of our little chats in public, people might start thinking you'd lost your wits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Personne d'autre ne peut me voir. On te prendrait pour <var 08 E905 ((une folle)) ((un fou)) /var> si tu parlais tout<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, dehors...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Those white-haired twins who were with you... I remember them from our battle in the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dis, ces jumeaux aux cheveux argentés... Ils étaient déjà là quand nous avons combattu dans le monde primitif, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Are they your friends, then? Through thick and thin?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Vous devez faire équipe depuis un certain temps, maintenant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aye...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Des compagnons fidèles, hein...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Then I suggest you keep them close. It's when you charge ahead trying to save someone else that you end up losing those you love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tu dois les protéger coûte que coûte. C'est quand on se lance à corps perdu dans une cause qu'on risque le plus de perdre ce qui nous est précieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Not that you need telling. I'll bet you've lost plenty. But I wonder...what will it cost you this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tu en as déjà fait l'expérience, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Je me demande ce que tu pourras sauver et ce qu'il te faudra sacrifier, cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005350_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I don't remember when it was that I learned regret wasn't worth the bother.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005350_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je n'ai même plus le cœur à me lamenter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005360_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You get numb to it all over the years. The lost comrades, the broken promises, the abandoned principles─just more nagging burdens to ignore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005360_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Après toutes ces années d'errance, je me sens las. La perte de mes camarades, les idéaux que nous avons défendus... il y a bien longtemps que ça me laisse froid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005370_RYNE<tab>(-???-)So this is what the Light was hiding...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005370_RYNE<tab>(-Jeune fille vêtue de blanc-)C'est à ça que ressemble vraiment le ciel, la nuit<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005380_RYNE<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s here. I must go to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005380_RYNE<tab>(-Jeune fille vêtue de blanc-)Je dois aller à sa rencontre... C'est le seul moyen...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005390_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, inside an imperial magitek facility in the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005390_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, dans une usine magitek garlemaldaise

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005400_GARLEANGENERAL<tab>(-Imperial Pilus Prior-)Intruders! Fan out and find them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005400_GARLEANGENERAL<tab>(-Commandant garlemaldais-)Déploiement d'urgence<var 1D /var>! Capturez l'intrus im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005410_ESTINIEN<tab>Out of my way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005410_ESTINIEN<tab>Tsk, un gêneur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-???-)Stay your weapon. We are not your enemy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-???-)Ça suffit. C'est un de mes hommes, pas un soldat garlemaldais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>When the alarum sounded, I wondered what we had done to betray our presence. But I see now we were not the only intruders.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Je me demandais comment nous avions été repérés, mais ce n'est pas nous qu'ils cherchaient, en fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Ser Estinien, I presume─the dragoon who plucked the Warrior of Light from the jaws of death. Your armor is most distinct.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Je reconnais cette armure et cette lance... Tu es Estinien, le chevalier dragon. C'est toi qui as sauvé <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne d'Éorzéa)) ((le héros d'Éorzéa)) /var> sur le champ de bataille, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005450_ESTINIEN<tab>Much as yours once was. But even without it, I see a former legatus still has eyes and ears in unexpected places.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005450_ESTINIEN<tab>Voilà quelqu'un de bien informé... Rien de bien étonnant pour l'ancien général des armées impériales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005460_ESTINIEN<tab>"Van“ Baelsar, in the flesh. Though I understand you prefer ”Shadowhunter“?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005460_ESTINIEN<tab>Devrais-je t'appeler Gaius Baelsar, ou “chasseur d'ombres”<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005470_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Hmph. You are in contact with the Scions, I take it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005470_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Je suppose que tu tiens ces in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions des Héritiers de la Septième Aube.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005480_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph. Through no choice of my own. They tracked me down, and conscripted me to their cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005480_ESTINIEN<tab>Sauf que je ne leur ai rien demandé. On est venu me trouver pour m'expliquer la situation, et je me suis retrouvé impliqué malgré moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005490_ESTINIEN<tab>I swear their receptionist was trained as a spy. Not that anyone can escape that Baldesion woman once she has caught the scent of your aether...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005490_ESTINIEN<tab>Je me demande encore comment cette Krile a su pister mon énergie éthérée... Quant à la petite réceptionniste, elle a sûrement une carrière d'espionne derrière elle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005500_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>If they have resorted to using freelancers, I must assume their attempts to wake the afflicted have failed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005500_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Je vois qu'ils ont toujours cette mauvaise habitude d'aller quémander de l'aide au moindre problème...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005510_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>And what of their champion?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005510_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Et notre <var 08 E905 ((fameuse héroïne)) ((fameux héros)) /var>, que devient-<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005520_ESTINIEN<tab>...Away on other business. Thus it has fallen to me to root out any trace of the Empire's new weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005520_ESTINIEN<tab>En voyage, à ce qu'il paraît... Et c'est ce qui me vaut cette petite visite ici, pour détruire la dernière arme de l'Empire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005530_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>If it is Black Rose you seek, you are too late. My people have already completed your mission here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005530_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Si tu veux parler de la rose noire, tu t'es déplacé pour rien. Mes hommes et moi venons tout juste de nous en charger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005540_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Yet this is but one factory among many. When they caught wind of our efforts, they built additional facilities to ensure production continues unabated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005540_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, cette usine n'est pas la seule. Les Impériaux sont devenus méfiants et ils ont étalé la production sur plusieurs sites.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005550_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>There will be no one left in the lands they conquer. No citizens to conscript, no skills to exploit, nothing the Empire needs. And they will call it <var 1A 02 /var>victory<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005550_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>C'est de la folie... La victoire importe-t-elle au point d'utiliser une arme aussi cruelle<var 1D /var>? À quoi bon...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005560_ESTINIEN<tab>...What exactly does this Black Rose do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005560_ESTINIEN<tab>Quel genre d'arme est cette “rose noire”, exactement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005570_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The gas is described as a poison, but its actual effect is more arcane in nature.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005570_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Certains la qualifient de chimique, mais en essence, il s'agit plutôt d'une arme magique.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005580_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>It was created to disrupt the aether in living beings─to bring the flow of their life energies to a standstill.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005580_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>La rose noire est capable d'arrêter la circulation de l'énergie qui parcourt le corps de tout être vivant... l'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005590_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Inhaling even the tiniest amount will cause all bodily functions to cease, much as a potent venom will stop a man's heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005590_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Il suffit d'une simple inhalation pour que les muscles se figent. Les fonctions vitales sont peu à peu perdues, jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005600_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Released over a city, Black Rose could conceivably kill every inhabitant, and all without damaging a single structure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005600_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Utilisée sur une cité, cette arme exterminerait la population en un instant, et sans endommager le reste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005610_GARLEANGENERAL<tab>(-Imperial Pilus Prior-)Search every corner! Rouse the barracks if you have to! I want this facility secured!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005610_GARLEANGENERAL<tab>(-Commandant garlemaldais-)Alors, vous ne l'avez toujours pas trouvé<var 1D /var>!? Appelez les renforts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005620_ESTINIEN<tab>I have more questions, but now is not the time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005620_ESTINIEN<tab>Rah... Plus le temps de discuter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005630_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Ser Estinien. I have an offer for you, but I will make it only once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005630_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Un instant, chevalier dragon. J'ai une proposition à te faire, par égard à un ami commun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005640_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Since it would seem we seek the same answers...you are welcome to join us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005640_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Puisque nous poursuivons tous les deux des intérêts similaires, que dirais-tu de nous associer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005650_ESTINIEN<tab>Hah! From what I hear, you need all the help you can get.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005650_ESTINIEN<tab>Ha<var 1D /var>! C'est ça oui... Tu crois vraiment que je vais faire équipe avec l'ancien général de la 14e légion pour attaquer Garlemald<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005660_ESTINIEN<tab>In case you don't know, Varis himself confessed that your empire was a creation of the Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005660_ESTINIEN<tab>L'Empereur lui-même a avoué que cette nation avait été créée par les Asciens<var 1D /var>! Et tu veux que je te fasse confiance<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005670_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>I am aware of what His Radiance said at the parley.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005670_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Oui. Varis a fait cette révélation pour le moins inattendue lors de sa rencontre avec les dirigeants de l'Alliance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005680_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Thus I would return to the capital, that I might behold the truth of this corruption with my own eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005680_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Mais c'est justement pour ça que je veux découvrir la vérité, et il n'y a qu'un endroit où nous pourrons la trouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005690_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>My path leads to Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005690_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Au palais impérial de Garlemald<var 1D /var>!
